description.zh: 本課程介紹電腦科學中圖形識別的基本原理與相關技術，使學生了解各種圖形識別的分類方法，經由對分類問題的分析，瞭解如何將輸入樣本依不同特性加以分類，並熟悉圖形識別系統之相關議題如：分割、特徵擷取、分類、後處理、訓練、監督/非監督式學習、機器學習，進而了解分類問題，增進其解決實際圖形識別分類問題的能力。課程內容包括下列課題：圖形識別概論, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood, 非參數法學習, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Positive Boolean Function多分類器, Linear Discriminant Functions，高維資料分類, 分類正確率評估(Accuracy Assessments)及其他重要的應用，例如: 文件分析、生物辨識、影像監控、遙測影像分類、醫療診斷、資料探勘等概念，最後並透過相關論文的研讀及討論，了解近代圖形識別的最新發展趨勢。
description.en: The course includes: Introduction to Pattern Recognition, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood & Bayesian Parameter Estimation, Non-Parametric Classification - Density Estimation, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Multi-Classifier - Positive Boolean Function, Linear Discriminant Functions, Pattern Recognition of High Dimensional Data Sets, Pattern Recognition for Remote Sensing Images, Biometric Certification, Video Surveillance, Accuracy Assessments and Other Related Topics.

description.zh: 1. 數學基礎2. Lyapunov 穩定度3. Lyapunov 方法4. LaSalle 定理與 Barbalat 引理5. Lagrange 系統之穩定分析6. 時間延遲系統之穩定分析
description.en: 1. Mathematical background2. Lyapunov stability3. Lyapunov method4. LaSalle's theorem and Barbalat's lemma5. Stability analysis of Lagrange systems6. Stability analysis of time-delay systems

description.zh: 先修課程：電磁學、工程數學、近代物理。 由電磁學之理論推導光波在光導波管之運行、偶合及調變，並經由近代物理之量子論介紹雷射理論及光偵測器原理。經由雷射之電光調變、光導波管之電場調制與光偵測器之光電轉換，將積體光學之基本概念完整介紹，並針對其特性及應用，加以說明。
description.en: From the electromagnetic theory, the optical waves propagation, coupling, and modulating in optical wave-guides are proposed. Also from the quantum theory introduced by modern physics, the laser theory and the principles of photo detectors are introduced. By the concepts of electro-optical modulation of laser devices, electrical modulation of optical wave-guides, and the opto-electronic conversion of photo detector devices, the fundamental concepts of integrated optics are introduced. Also the characteristics and applications of integrated optics are presented.

description.zh: 探討PN接面之特性，短通道效應，表通道技術原理，費米能階等基本元件物理，及0.25-0.18微米以下需明瞭元件物理知識。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, sub-half micre CMOS device,characteristics of P/N junction, short channel effect, surface channel N/P device, Fermi-level etc. The relative hpysical knowledge of 0.25 um device is discussed as well.

description.zh: 1.探究Crystal Cycle 景氣週期循環2.探究光電產業關鍵零組件與材料產業的內容與現況3.熟悉與運用Porter五力分析、SWOT分析、與鑽石分析之研究工具4.趨勢量化研究工具SPSS之熟悉與運用5.技術創新機制模型之研發與運用6.專利申請之運用
description.en: 1.explore the Crystal Cycle of prosperity period2.	explore the contents and current of the key component and material in the Electro-Optical Industry3.know and apply the research tool of Porter's, SWOT's, and Diamond's for qualitative4.know and apply the research tool of SPSS for quantification5.develop and apply the model of the creative mechanism in technology6.perform the application of patent

notes: 四光四和光電所合開,限15人

description.zh: 近軸光學、光線追跡、賽德像差理論、色差校正、鏡頭設計原理、消色差雙片鏡組、場曲校正、三片式鏡組、目鏡與無焦系統、反射式光學系統設計、數位相機取像鏡頭設計專題、變焦鏡頭設計專題
description.en: Paraxial Optics, Ray Tracing, Seidel Aberrations, Chromatic Aberrations, Principles of Lens Design, Achromatic Doublet Objective, PetzvalLenses, Triple Cooke Lens, Eyepiece and Afocal System, Catadioptric System, Special topic on Digital Still Camera, Special topic on Zoom Lens

description.zh: 本課程介紹固體，尤其是半導體的光學性質，目的在了解光學檢測及光電元件的基礎原理。 藉由學習電磁波與半導體的交互作用，一方面可了解光在半導體中的產生、傳播、吸收、散射、及在界面的透射與反射等現象的規律，另一方面亦可認識光學特性與能帶結構、聲子結構、束縛與自由電子、及各種激發態之間的關係。課程內容包含固態物理複習、光學特性簡介、古典模型、帶間躍遷、激子、螢光現象、半導體低維系統的光學性質、自由載子及缺陷的光學性質、聲子相關特性、非線性光學性質等。
description.en: This course introduces the optical properties of solids, mainly semiconductors. The fundamental principles of absorption, reflection, luminescence and light scattering will be illustrated in terms of classical and quantum theories as appropriate. It mainly includes (1) Introduction (2) Classical propagation (3) Interband absorption (4) Excitons (5) Luminescence (6) Low-dimensional systems of semiconductors (7) Free electrons (8) Luminescence centers (9) Phonons (10)Nonlinear properties.

name.zh: 非線性光纖光學與應用

description.zh: 利用光纖來製造雷射與光放大器已經廣泛的應用在各領域，由於光纖具有小的纖核，且光在此介質傳播時，通常具有相當長的傳播距離，此外利用各種鎖模技術所產生的短脈衝或是藉由光放大器，使得在光纖中傳播的光具有相當高的功率或是峰值功率，因此許多非線性光學的現象在光纖中被產生，近來更種新穎的光纖包括利用微結構光纖或稱為光子晶體光纖被廣泛的應用，使得光纖所產生非線性效應更為顯著，本課程將介紹在光纖中各種非線性光學現象產生的原理與其應用。
description.en: Fiber laser and amplifier have been widely used in various fields.  Due to  its small core and relative long propagation length of fiber and relative large  power and peak power light source is used, that is generated from mode-locked technique and amplifier, various nonlinear optical phenomena can be observed through propagation of the fiber.  Recently, many novel optical fibers including the microstructured fiber or termed photonic crystal fiber are widely used to cause the advance of the generated nonlinear phenomena.  In this course, it will introduce the principle of the generated nonlinear effects and its applications.

description.zh: 本課程之設計，在介紹學生資訊安全的概念，並瞭解相關的技術與應用。本課程包括下列主題：資訊安全簡介、傳統加密法、私鑰加密技術、公鑰加密技術與雜湊函數、訊息認證編碼與協定、認證系統、電子郵件安全技術、網際網路協定安全技術、全球資訊網安全技術、系統安全技術、防火牆系統等。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with the knowledge and techniques essential in information security. The topics to be covered include: introductions to information security, conventional encryption, private key technologies, public key technologies and hash functions, message authentication code and protocols, authentication systems, Kerberos, X.509 7, E-Mail security, PGP, S/MIME, IP security, Web security, SHTTP, SSL (Secure Session Layer), system security, and firewall systems.

description.zh: 本課程介紹在數位影像處理領域中會使用到的基本觀念與技術. 數位影像處理有非常多重要的應用, 如: 影像內容改善, 工業檢測, 機器知覺等. 課程內容包括: 1.數位影像處理的基礎 2.影像的轉換 3.影像的加強 4.影像的復原 5.彩色影像的處理6.影像的壓縮 7.影像的分割與特徵抽取 8.影像的表達及描述 9.影像的辨認與解釋
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce the basic concepts and techniques used in the field of digital image processing (IP). Digital Image Processing has many important applications, for example, image contents improvement, industrial inspection, machine perception. The outline of this course is: 1.Digital image fundamentals 2.Image transforms 3.Image enhancement 4. Image restoration 5. Color image processing 6. Image compression 7. Image segmentation and feature detection 8. Representation and description 9. Recognition and interpretation.

description.zh: 專題演講或書報討論
description.en: In this course, we will invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in computer science and information engineering.

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹學生個人軟體程序的概念與技術，幫助學生建立相關的技能以提升其開發軟體的能力。透過原理與實作的結合，引導學生學習軟體專案計畫、追蹤、測量、與分析等方法，並學習如何使用這些方法來改善個人軟體開發的效能。課程內容包括下列主題：一、個人軟體程序策略二、個人軟體程序基準三、計劃I - 計劃的流程四、計劃II - 軟體規模測量五、計劃III - 軟體規模估算六、計劃IV - 資源與時程估算七、個人軟體程序測量八、設計與程式碼檢驗九、個人軟體程序擴展十、個人軟體程序應用
description.en: 英文概述English Description 	The objective of this course is to introduce the concepts and technologies of personal software process and help students build the skills required for doing better development work. In particular, students will learn comprehensive planning, tracking, measuring, and analysis methods and learn how to use these techniques to improve their personal performance in developing software projects. The course will cover the following topics: 1.The Personal Software Process Strategy 2.The Baseline Personal Process 3.Planning I - The Planning Process 4.Planning II - Measuring Software Size 5.Planning III - Estimating Software Size 6.Planning IV - Resources and Schedules Estimating7.Measurements in the Personal Software Process 8.Design and Code Reviews9.Scaling Up the Personal Software Process10.Using the Personal Software Process

description.zh: 0. 簡介 第一部份：源編碼 1. 源編碼定理與熵 2. 非失真壓縮：runlength, Huffman, arithmetic, Lempel-Ziv, * 3. 碼率-失真定理 4. 失真壓縮：量化、預測技術、轉換與次頻帶編碼、MPEG 第二部分：通道編碼 5. 通道編碼定理與通訊容量 6. 有限場簡介7. 區塊碼：CRC, Hamming, Golay, BCH, Reed-Solomon, * 8. 迴旋碼 9. 編碼調變）
description.en: 0. Introduction Part I. Source Coding 1. Source Coding Theorem and Entropy 2. Lossless Compression: runlength, Huffman, arithmetic, Lempel-Ziv, * 3. Rate-Distortion Theorem 4. Lossy Compression: quantization, predictive techniques, transform and subband coding, MPEG Part II. Channel Coding 5. Channel Coding Theorem and Capacity 6. Introduction to Finite Fields 7. Block Codes: CRC, Hamming, Golay, BCH, Reed-Solomon, * 8. Convolutional Codes 9. Coded Modulation

notes: 資工所和電資國際班合開

description.zh: 1.數位影像處理的基礎 2.影像的轉換 3.影像的加強 4.影像的復原 5.彩色影像的處理6.影像的壓縮 7.影像的分割與特徵抽取 8.影像的表達及描述 9.影像的辨認與解釋10.導航與醫學影像
description.en: 1.Digital image fundamentals 2.Image transforms. 3.Image enhancement 4. Image restoration 5. Color image processing. 6. Image compression. 7. Image segmentation and feature detection 8. Representation and desciption 9. Recogmition and interpretation  10. Applications: ALV navigation and medical image.

name.en: Philosophy of Technological and Vocational Education

description.zh: 本課程在探究技職教育的本質、目標、歷史發展及相關哲學思潮，期培養學生發展批判思考能力分析技職教育相關議題。
description.en: This course is designed to investigate the purpose, essence, history,    and related philosophical thinking of Vocational and Technological Technical Education (VTE)；to develop students forming critical thinking to analyze the current issues in VTE.

name.zh: 教育訓練需求評估與規劃

description.zh: 教育訓練是人力資源的一環，本課程探討教育訓練的種類及評估訓練需求的方法與程序，並了解人力部門在規劃員工訓練計劃之前，如何對員工進行調查以確實地掌握員工的需求及意願，同時亦能掌握企業之發展目標。
description.en: Educational training is part of the human resources. This curriculum will discuss the categories of educational training and evaluate the methods and procedures of the training needs, and understand how the human resource department investigates the employee's needs and will, and know the development aim of the enterprise as well before the planning of the employee educational training program.

name.zh: 雲端運算之應用與服務
name.en: Applications and Services of Cloud Computing

description.zh: 雲端運算是指透過網際網路進行擴充、消費或提供IT服務，因而顧客可隨時取用Web化的網路資源、軟體或資料。實際上，雲端運算 (Cloud Computing)是新一代的網際網路服務以及新一代的資料中心。本課程的主要內容包含網路基礎(含TCP/IP)、Client/Server和Intranet計算、雲端運算基本概念、雲端運算的核心技術、多人租用控制、雲端運算的服務模式、雲端運算應用架構、雲端運算的安全/私密/信任管理議題、雲端運算的發展策略以及結論。此外，本課程亦選擇一些有關雲端運算的期刊論文指定予同學研讀並於課堂上簡報和討論之。總之，本課程的教學目標是為了能讓同學完全瞭解最新的雲端運算之技術趨勢、應用發展以及服務管理。
description.en: Cloud Computing is a new model for enabling convenient, on-demand network access to a shared pool of configurable computing resources that can be rapidly provisioned and released with minimal management effort or service provider interaction. Practically, Cloud Computing is new frontier of Internet Computing and next generation Data Centers. This course covers Networking Fundamentals (including TCP/IP); Client/Server and Intranet Computing; Cloud Computing: An Overview; Core Technologies of Cloud Computing; Cloud Service Models; Multi-tenancy Control, Cloud Application Architecture: Hadoop: HDFS, Hbase, MapReduce; Security, Privacy and Trust Management Issues for Cloud Computing; Developing Strategies in Cloud Computing; and Conclusion. In summary, the teaching goal of this course is to provide students with the full understanding in technologies trend, applications development, and services management of Cloud Computing.

description.zh: 本課程的主要目標是提供修課者對多變量方法的理論了解與軟體工具，作為協助專業計畫或論文研究有關於多變量資料的分析。本課程內容為Matrix Algebra & Random Vectors, Comparisons on Several Multivariate Linear Regression Models, Principal Components, Factor Analysis, Canonical Correlation Analysis, Discrimination & Classification, Clustering 等。課程內容除了理論介紹外，期刊論文應用的例子是本課程教材的另一特色。成績以專案報告、期中、期末考為評分依據。
description.en: Introduction & SAS, Matrix Algebra & Random Vectors, Comparisons on Several Multivariate Means, Multivariate Linear Regression Models, Journal paper discussion-Multiple Regression, Principal Components, Journal paper, iscussion-PCA Factor Analysis, Journal paper discussion-Factor Analysis, Canonical Correlation Analysis, Journal paper discussion-Canonical Correlation Analysis, Discrimination & Classification, Journal paper discussion-Discrimination & Classification, Clustering, Project

description.zh: 本課程主要探討服務行銷的重要內容，包括顧客行為、關係行銷、行銷策略設計與服務品質模式探討及顧客滿意度研究。課程將配合實例進行討論。
description.en: This course is to discuss some important topics of service marketing:  Consumer Behavior, Relationship Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Service Quality Model and Customer Satisfaction.  The course  contains lecture and case study helping student to know the most important issues in service marketing practice.

description.zh: 本課程介紹環境之物理及人因相關因素對人員生理及肌肉骨骼系統之影響。內容包括噪音與噪音防治、氣溫等大氣狀況、振動與加速度、環境照明、人體計測與工作/工作空間設計等相關內容。課程目的在使修課學生了解工業環境與作業負荷對於人員之影響，進而於職場建立有效之因應對策。使學生能夠a. 瞭解工作場所主要人因工程危害因子(包括採光照明、噪音振動、極端溫濕環境、異常氣壓等物理因子及肌肉骨骼危害因子)、法規要求、量測/計算方法、評估與控制策略、以及相對應的預防措施。b. 具有評估及分析工業環境物理性與肌肉骨骼危害因子及擬訂其控制及預防對策的能力。
description.en: This course introduces physical and musculoskeletal effects of various environmental and ergonomic factors on humans. Lectures cover topics of noise and noise control, environmental temperature, vibration and acceleration measurements, environmental illumination, and work design. This course aims to cultivate students to identify different types of ergonomic risk factors (e.g. luminance, extreme temperatures, abnormal pressure, noise, vibration, musculoskeletal hazards) that can present in the work environment and to learn the related regulation requirements, risk assessment tools, and hazard control strategies.

notes: 四工四甲和四工四乙合開

description.zh: 探討如何規畫、組織、用人、領導及控制各種資源包括人員、設備、材料、資金，期能及時在容許預算下完成特定專案。
description.en: This course discovers the planning, organization, employment, leading and control of resources including person, facility, materials, and capital in order to complete the project under the pre-specified time and cost.

notes: 四工四甲和四工四乙合開

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的盛行，電子商務迅速地蓬勃發展，使得傳統的商店與行銷環境受到衝擊。資訊科技改變了消費習慣與行銷通路，電子商務的效應已經開始影響商業活動的每個層面，從新產品的開發、銷售、到售後服務均受影響，為企業帶來了無限商機。根據資策會的報告顯示，網際購物市場目前正進入高成長期。網際網路的消費觀念逐漸普及，消費者端的網路交易市集，亦成為未來重要的網路商機。不僅B2C市場（企業對消費者）極具潛力，網友個體戶的開店創業風潮（C2C）更是在蓬勃發中。在台灣，擁有十個以上員工的公司有86%有自屬的企業網站，而擁有自屬網站的頁有近七成聘僱網頁設計師進駐公司任職，面對網路商業的來臨，有著大量的網路商業的人才需求。只要有正確的網路商業經營獲利模式，網路是一個可以賺到大錢的管道，尤其低門檻、低成本的網路拍賣場更是最佳踏板。本課程講授網路創業及網路商業的必要實務經營能力，讓同學在本課程裡學得如何快速的以最少成本來DIY速成個人事業及就業的能力。
description.en: Following the prevailing of the internet, the vigorous development e-commerce has given great impacts on traditional tangible stores and the whole marketing environments. Information Technology has not only changed our lives, but also changed consumers' behavior and marketing channels; and the e-commerce effect has already started to permeate into every stratum of business activities, including the exploitation, marketing, and after-sales service of new products, brings the industries infinite business chances. According to the reports of Institute for Information Industry, the market of internet shopping is going into its high development period, and there are a lot of chances to establish a new enterprise on the internet. So this course will teach about the internet entrepreneurial management.

notes: 四工四和最後一哩合開,限160人

description.zh: 資料和決策課程主要在介紹資訊和資料工程學，電腦推論的應用和企業決策管理等內容的設計的決策支援系統、資料抽離、資料採礦和智慧型的使用者－系統的合作系?。並利用電腦的使用來發現資料的型態，及其他任何類型的本文、影像或數字。其目的為幫助企業經理在不確定之情況下，瞭解資料和決策分析，作出較好的決定。
description.en: Data and Decision course focuses on information and data engineering, computational reasoning applied, and enterprise decision management to the design of decision support systems, information extraction, data mining, and intelligent, adaptive user-system collaboration. It implements the use of computers to discover patterns in data, of any kind, text, images or numbers.To develop an understanding of data and decision analysis to help managers make better decisions in the presence of uncertainty.

notes: 四工四和最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討各種類型之神經網路，如逆傳遞網路，機率神經網路、學習向量量化網路、反傳遞網路、自述應共振理論、霍普菲爾網路、雙向聯想記憶網路、自組織映射圖網路等，此外相關文獻及運用之領域將深入討論。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the several ANN paradigm, such as Backpropagation, probability ANN, Counter-propagation, self-organization map. Hopfield network, BAN etc. Besides, the relative literature and applications will also cover.

description.zh: 在本課程中，藉由資料蒐集、活動設計、課堂討論與經驗分享等過程，使學生對學習生產力及其特性有所省思與瞭解，掌握正確有效的學習方法，學習如何主動組合、整理、解釋知識，進而培養推廣該專業領域新知的能力。
description.en: By collecting the information, activity planned, discussion in the lessons and sharing the experiences etc. in order to make the students understand this course and it's characteristic, moreover, exactly know well the effective mothod of learning, studying how to make up automatically, arrangement, explain the knowledge, in the meantime, to train and spread their professional ability in the new territory

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹微處理系統的介面設計。其中包括記憶體介面，一般的輸出輸入介面以及CPLD/FPGA介面。由於CPLD與FPGA大量應用在嵌入式系統中，如何利用微處理器的彈性軟體設計，搭配CPLD/FPGA的高速運算能力，將是本課程的重點。
description.en: Interfacing between microprocessor and peripheral will be discussed in this course.  The interfacing technique includes memory interface, general peripheral and CPLD/FPGA devices.  A large number of industrial applications have applied CPLD/FPGA into their design.  This course will also focus on integrating of microcontroller and CPLD/FPGA devices by taking advantages of the flexibility of microcontroller and high speed calculation capability of CPLD/FPGA devices.

description.zh: 本單元介紹台灣當紅的數位藝術潮流，並從生活面來思考，廣義的數位藝術，正如何影響我們的生活經驗。近三十年來，隨著數位科技全面改變我們的生活方式，數位藝術在國內外也逐漸受到重視，成為一種不可忽視的藝術形態。不止在純藝術方面帶來衝擊，在設計、影視、廣告等各種應用藝術的相關領域，更是帶來生產方式的全面革新，甚至是思考方式的改變。自古以來，藝術家就不停地探索適合創作的新媒材，數位科技的便利，在藝術家眼中，是另一種全新的可能性。課程含數位美學，美學可分為兩種一維螢幕內的東西如介面motion graphic, user interface, orientation.；另一為產品或裝置在環境、燈光、機械等的應用。
description.en: This course is an attempt to introduce the most popular digital art trend and to reflect upon how the digital art in general is affecting our life experiences at the present time. In the recent thirty years, the advance of technology has entirely changed our lifestyle. Digital art has gained much attention and become a trend of art which can not be unheeded. It has an impact not only on fine arts but also on fields related to art, such as design, film and video, and advertisement. Furthermore, digital art brought about a revolutionized change of production as much as thinking. Artists have always been looking for new media for creation, and the convenience of digital technology will be a whole new possibility in the perspective. The course includes digital aesthetics which is divided into two categories: 1. things that can be seen in the one-dimension monitor such as motion graphic, user interface, and orientation, 2. the applications of products or device in different environment, lig

description.zh: 一、 本課程目的在使同學認識與了解台灣傳統建築歷史、文化、技術之精髓所在，進而增進建築設計運用傳統建築思想與素材之能力。二、 講述內容包括台灣史前、原住民、荷西、明鄭、清代與近現代等建築之形成與型態變遷過程。三、 講述方式以幻燈片介紹為主，學期中並安排兩次實地參訪。
description.en: 1. This course is based on the belief that： to recognized and understanding of the historical 、culture and technique in the Taiwan Traditional Architecture. 2. The scope of the course are include the styles and changes in prehistorically period, aboriginal, Dutch colonialist, Ch'ing Dynasty and contemporary Taiwan Traditional Architecture. 3. The methods of the course are slides shows and to visit the historical sites

name.en: The housing Development and urban Policy

description.zh: 針對學生在建築設計及都市規劃基礎訓練之後，有異於前期以技術性思考，改以都市開發及宏觀政策及微觀個案財務之角度切入建築及都市開發之議題，以輔助學生建立都市開發與都市型態間關連性之整合概念。
description.en: After the technical approaches in urban planning and building design, the financial and political issues are to be taken into consideration in urban affairs. The micro- financial plan in developments and the macro- political issues in housing policy would be introduced to the urban planning practice.

description.zh: 本課程綜合的介紹電化學之原理與其應用.在原理方面包括離子之作用及其平衡,電解質之導電性質,界面現象,電極電位,電化學電池和電極動力程序等內容.而在應用方面則涵蓋溶液物理參數測量,電化學分析技術,電化學感應器,電鍍,表面處理,金屬腐蝕防治,電池,電透析和電合成等
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry and its applications. In the principles which includes ionic interaction, ionic equilibrium, the conducting properties of electrolytes, interfacial phenomena, electrode potentials, electrochemical cells and electrode kinetic process. For the application covers determination of physical parameters in the solutions, electroanalytical techniques, electroplating, electrochemical sensors, surface finishing, metal corrosion prevention, cells, electrodialysis, and electrosynthesis etc.

notes: 四化二甲乙丙合開,限55人

description.zh: 結合生物技術與化工原理來進行微生物、動、植物細胞之培養、酵素之提取、反應動力學、生物反應器的操作與相關參考數之獲取法、產品之分離程序等。
description.en: In combination of biotechnology and chemical engineering to learn cell incubation, enzyme purification, bioreactor operation, and product separation, etc.

notes: 四化四甲乙丙合開,限35人

description.zh: 本課程目標在教授學生生醫材料與醫療器材技術商品化之實務知識。首先介紹生醫材料產品之特性與市場概況，並由各國醫療法規為出發點，教導學生了解生醫材料產品上市所需之相關程序。特別透過實例之講解，引導學生了解設計、製造、測試三大重點之實務操作。包括產品設計之準則，ISO 13485醫療器材品質系統實務操作，臨床前生物相容測試以及臨床試驗之執行等。課程設計將著重實際法規之講解、實力講解與分析以工廠參觀。將由本校專任教師配合企業講師任教，培育學生迅速進入相關產業工作之能力。
description.en: The objective of this course it to illustrate the commercialization process for biomaterials products. The features and the marketing overview of biomaterials will be introduced first. The regulatory issues and the necessary procedures for the commercialization process will be introduced. By the case studies, it is designed to train the students about the necessary concepts of product design, manufacturing and testing processes. It consists of the product design guidelines, ISO 13485 medical products GMP, pre-clinical and clinical tests.

notes: 四化四甲乙丙和最後一哩合開,限70人

description.zh: 介紹工業觸媒在化學工業上所扮演的重要角色與有關吸附與催化之理論基礎，使學生瞭解工業觸媒的各種型態、物性、化性、鑑定方法、基本製造方法、性能評估及動力測試等內容在工業上實際應用例包括氫化、氧化、烷基化、裂解、重組、分餾、脫硫工程、汽車廢氣之控制以及藥物之合成。
description.en: Studies of homogeneous and heterogeneous catalysis, with emphasis on industrial applications. Catalytic processes, engineering problems, catalysts preparation, deactivation and regeneration also discussed.

notes: 四化四甲乙丙合開,限40人

description.zh: 本課程包含工程繪圖基本觀念與電腦輔助繪圖技能，從2D繪圖到3D空間觀念的基本圖學觀念，引導學生瞭解工程圖的原理與重要性，進而帶領學生操作電腦輔助繪圖軟體與3D視覺化呈現，並以工程案例，培養其對工程的素養與獲取相關證照的基本能力。
description.en: This course instructs the spatial concepts of basic 2D/3D and projection methods, facilitating students to understand the principles and importance of engineering drawings. This course guides students to manipulate modern computer-aided design software and generate 3D rendered visualization, for the fundamental capabilities on acquiring related licenses.

notes: 四土二甲乙合開,計網電腦教室,限60人

description.zh: 環境生態學主要講述基本生態學之原理原則，進而應用於土木建設工程的方式主要內容包含：(1)環境生態系統、(2)生態學之基本法則、(3)質與能傳遞、(4)汙染物對生態之影響、(5)台灣地區之生態保育、(6)工程開發生態系統造成之影響、(7)環境影響評估、(8)交通及營建工程之環境問題、(9)全球環境變遷、(10)環境品質與法規。
description.en: How to use the national sources in a way to have sustainable development is the main purpose of this study. Improper usage of resources will bring a serious disaster from the natural feed back. Construction should take care of the ecology system and the methods of carefulness would be studied in this course.

description.zh: 地質工程為一新興科學，原來為解決全球變遷等大尺度問題而提出。基本上可以土木及環境工程兩大方面。本課程將從地質背景出發，結合工程問題及其處理對策，提供學生一個整合性的思考及基礎的地質知能。
description.en: Geoengineering is planetary-scale environmental engineering, particularly engineering aimed at counteracting the undesired side effects of other human activities. Geoengineering covers a wide range of engineering disciplines related to geo-materials, such as foundation engineering, slope engineering, tunnelling, rock engineering, engineering geology and geo-environmental engineering. This course interests range from geological to geomorphological concept, to provide a firm fundamental background for the civil engineering and environmental engineering, and to manage and mitigate of natural hazards. Implicit in these pursuits is the stewardship of the earth, and the quest to harvest the most advanced fruits of scientific achievements as tools for our graduates to work with.

description.zh: A.質點運動:1.位置,速度和加速度2.直線運動 3.曲線運動 4.軌道運動 5.相對運動 B.質點運動力學:1.牛頓運動定律 2.慣性參考構架 3.質量中心的運動方程式.C. 能量法:功與動能:1.功與功率;位能 3.保守力 4.保守能 D.動量法:1.動量與衡量原則 2.保守線性動量 3.衝擊力 4.角動量 5.質量流
description.en: (A)Dynamics of a particles:(1)Kinematics of a particles:rectilinear coordinates, tangential and normal coordinates,polar coordinates.(2)Kinetics of a particles:force and acceleration, work and energy,impulse and momentum.(B)Dynamics of a rigid bodies (1)Kinematics of rigid bodies:translation and rotation,relative motion,instaneous zero velocity center.(2)Kinetics of rigid bodies:force and acceleration, work and energy, impulse and momentum.

description.zh: 由於近年來電腦科技發展迅速，在透過地理資訊系統的幫助下，圖文整合的資料庫型態，已有相當完整成熟的作業方式。本課程將針對地理資訊系統的應用功能方向，分別剖析其主要架構與理論。同時配合相關地理資訊系統軟體，建立學員實作能力。
description.en: Operational and management issues in planning management analysis,locational decision making,and design implementation of GIS.Lab project emphasizes student'sspecialization.

description.zh: 隨著人類對於工程技術的省思，以及環境倫理的變遷，兼顧生態、安全、景觀等面向生態工法逐漸受到重視。我國自2002年起，全力推動生態工法的落實及應用上的困難。有鑑於此，特開立「生態工法概論」，建立全盤性的了解，使土木工程能迎合時代的需求，提升相關智識水準。因此，將分別就基本精神、案例、應用範疇等議題進行探討。
description.en: This is intended as brief introduction to the subject of Ecological Engineering Methods(EEM), which is a whole new concept in the field of civil engineering. The Advantages of EEM is not only to satisfy the demand of safety(i.e. natural hazards control)but also that of protecting ecosystem and landscape aesthetic. In 2002, related government agencies try to pormote the application of EEM , and attempt to adopt this specific measure. However, the lack of basic understanding and knowledge has been the main reason why engineers are struggling in introducing EEM into reality. Therefore, including fundamental theories, cases study, and practical apects of application will be taught in this course. The optimal goal is to inspire students to learn more about new philosopgy and techniques in the world of civil engineering.

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

description.zh: 以演講，討論，口頭及書面報告方式，探討土木與防災之相關課題，如結構檢測評估與補強，水土防災技術，防災體系與資訊，都市防災，消防防災，施工災變，環境防災規劃與管理等。
description.en: By means of addresses discussion, oral presentations and reports to learn and investigate the related civil and disaster prevention subjects, such as structure testing, evaluation and repairing, soil and water disaster prevention, urban precaution, fire fighting, construction safety, environmental planning, and management for disaster prevention.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作﹐包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段﹐避免口語用字寫字的陋習﹐使所作之文章能掌握其涵意﹐亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Technical Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

description.zh: 本課程將包含不可壓縮流體之特性探討、管流與明渠流之特性、邊界層理論、數值模擬與主要水工構造物之設計原理。
description.en: Fundamental properties of incompressible fluids; hydrostatics and fluid motion in closed conduits and open channels; potential flow; boundary layers; preliminary design of hydraulic structures; numerical analysis.

description.zh: 水文遙測主要之目的為藉由衛星及飛機等的儀器收集地表對不同波長之反射特性，並加以分析，因此可用於國土監測及防災等。藉由波長反射的特性可率訂所需的參數，將可用於大尺度的模擬，如地表能量平衡、地表水文、土地利用、植物指標、地表溫度、輻射通量及地表土壤濕度等。
description.en: Observations by instruments on board satellites provide data on radiative characteristics of the earth's surface at various wavelengths.  From these characteristics, one may determine parameters of interest for large-scale modeling of the earth's energy balance and surface hydrology, for instance land use, vegetation indices, surface temperature, radiative fluxes, and surface soil moisture.

name.en: Legal Affairs and Dispute resolution in Construction

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與土木有關之法規，諸如建築法、建築技術規則、都市計劃法、採購法、環保法規、水利法等，併借相關案例之分析研究，訓練學生土木法規之知識與能力。
description.en: The course is dive lessons on code of building , rule of construction technology ,stock up code ,code of environmental protection etc.

description.zh: 本課程探討作業研究方法在營建工程之應用，課程內容包括作業方研究方法，施工作業研究，工期控制之作業研究，資源調配之作業研究，工期與成本控制之作業研究，施工材料之最佳管理，其他施工作業問題之研究。
description.en: operation's studyConstruction engineer and the study of operations. The study of the operation's method , construction , working phase, distribution the resources, working phase and cost control the best manage of construction making and other studies of working matters.

name.en: Special Topics on Construction Project Management

description.zh: 本課程主要針對營建管理領域重要課題以及營建時事進行分析探討，透過課題分析、報告以及討論，增進學生對於營建管理領域相關課題之了解及認知，進而思考日後可能面對的類似課題。
description.en: 英課名：Investigation drill of build engineering        Discuss and analyze subjects of construction         management domain and current issue. By the subjects         analysis, reports and discussion, students can          improve their abilities of understanding the         construction management domain, and thinking of         similar subjects they may have later.

description.zh: 認識坡地災害，包括全球性的原因與台灣地區特有的自然因素、人為因素及坡地災害現，進而討論坡地災害防治的原則及方法。1.坡地災害防治的重要性 2.坡地災害的全球性原因 3.台灣的削平速率與山坡地崩坍概況 4.台灣地區最脆弱的坡地 5.台灣地區坡地災害的自然動力 6.坡地災害的人為因素 7.坡地破壞之前兆 8.坡地災害防治一般性原則 9.坡地災害防治所必需的基本資料 10.坡地災害的防治與復育技術 11.坡地災害的緊急救治方法 12坡地災害個案分析
description.en: Slope calamity prevention  To understand slope -suffering, include global factors and specific nature factors, man-made factors and current slope-suffering in Taiwan to discuss the slope calamity prevention's method and principles. 1.the importance of slope calamity prevention2.the global factors of slope calamity prevention3.the cut velocity and slope slide overview4.the frailest slope in Taiwan5.the nature factor in Taiwan slope calamity 6.the man-made factor in slope calamity7.the omen of slope damage8.the general principles in slope calamity prevention9.essential basic information of slope calamity prevention10.slope calamity prevention and repair skill11.the emergency treatment in slope calamity prevention 12.slope calamity case analyses

description.zh: 妥善地利用資源可促使資源生生不息，不當地濫用卻會帶來大地反撲，禍及人類，如何在建設的同時,大興土木之際，顧及生態體系，及為本課程之主要重點。課程內容包括環境生態系統、生態學之基本法則、質能傳遞、污染物對生態之影響。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to learn how to use the natural sources for industrial development but alse maintain the ecological balance. Improper usage of natural resourses will bring adverse results. The topic will include:fundamental ecology, mass and energy transfer and the impact of industrial development on ecology.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 對無機化合物之結構，化學性質等，利用量子化學，群論及結晶化學等加以探討。以配合天然礦物之形成，產狀，地球化學及環境化學等學科之授課內容。
description.en: The chemical structure and properties of inorganic compounds, which are useful for the following courses: the forming and occurrence of minerals, earth and environmental chemistry, will be discussed by using quantum chemistry, group theory and crystallography.

description.zh: 一、張量分析(Tensor  analysis)二、熱性質(Thermal properties)三、電性質(Electrical  Properties)四、介電性質(Dielectric  Properties)五、磁性質(Magnetic  Properties)六、 光學性質(Optical  Properties)
description.en: This course is a special topics of Physical properties of Material.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 介紹工程成本運算的各種方法，藉由不同的數學分析技巧，推估並了解                                         不同工程資金運用方案的差異性，以為決策評估及成本控制的依據。
description.en: Introduction the methods of engineering cost calculate.

description.zh: 塑性加工係藉塑性變形將金屬材料變化成目的形狀之金屬加工法。本課程包含：金屬塑性變形之基礎，塑性力學之基礎及各種塑性加工法之介紹，最近之塑性加工技術的進步，並涉及與塑性加工關連之成形技術及適合各種塑性加工材料之選擇。
description.en: Plastic deformation processing is a metal processing method which based on plastic deformation to transform metal material into objective shape. This course includes the foundation of metal plastic deformation, the foundation of plastic dynamics, and the introduction of all kinds of plastic deformative processing methods. The recent technology development of plastic deformation processing is related to formation technique and suitable for alternatives to all kinds of plastic deformation materials.

description.zh: 固態元件簡介,功能電子陶瓷(functional ceramics); 同時可對某些物理量如壓 ,力,音, 濕度, 溫度, 氣體等產生響應, 故其亦可稱為感測陶瓷(sensing ceramics). 精密電子陶瓷課程內容將對日常生活常見之介電陶瓷, 壓電陶瓷, 焦電陶瓷, 半導體陶瓷及磁性陶瓷等部分作深入淺出介紹.
description.en: It may also be called as Solid-state Devices and "functional ceramics" because of the special function applied in practical circuits; through the responses caused by pressure, force, sound, moisture, temperature and different gas, the fine electronic ceramics may also be called "sensing ceramics". In this course, the dielectric ceramics, piezoelectric ceramics, pyroelectric ceramics, semiconducting ceramics and magnetic ceramics will be introduced with their applications.

description.zh: 本課程內容目的在介紹電化學之原理與其應用.一、在原理方面包括離子之作用及其平衡,電解質之導電性質,界面現象,電極電位,電化學電池和電極動力程序等內容.二、在應用方面則涵蓋溶液化學參數測量,電化學分析技術,電鍍,表面處理,金屬腐蝕防治,電池應用,和電合成等
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry and its applications. In the principles which includes ionic interaction, ionic equilibrium, the conducting properties of electrolytes, interfacial phenomena, electrode potentials, electrochemical cells and electrode kinetic process. For the application covers determination of physical parameters in the solutions, electroanalytical techniques, electroplating, electrochemical sensors, surface finishing, metal corrosion prevention, cells, electrodialysis, and electrosynthesis etc.

description.zh: 課程綱要：1.半導體元件簡介2.物理氣相沉積3.化學氣相沉積4.微影─光阻覆蓋，曝光，顯影5.蝕刻─濕式蝕刻，乾式蝕刻6.攙雜─擴散法，離子植入法7.氧化和熱處理製程
description.en: Course Outline：1.Introduction to Semiconductor Device2.Physical Vapor Deposition3.Chemical Vapor Deposition4.Photolithography─photoresist coating, exposure, development5.Etching─wet etching, dry etching6.Doping─diffusion, ion implantation7.Oxidation and Thermal Treatment Process

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹有關材料反應動力學的基礎理論與技術。
description.en: The course describes the basic concept and confines its attention to those features of kinetics that seem to be most important for students in the field of Material Sciences and Engineering. The course covers a range from several points of view; the half life of a reactant, the time taken for half of the reactant to be consumed. Relevant of the branches of Materials Sciences, such as Biology, Chemical engineering, Electrochemistry, Inorganic chemistry, Mechanical Engineering, Pharmacology, and physics are also mentioned in macroscopic kinetics investigations.

description.zh: 寶石業為台灣新興的工業之一，集地質學、礦物學、結晶學、切割技術、商業行為及藝術美感於此門學問，寶石礦物的物理及化學性質和鑑定，寶石礦物的生成和產狀及其地理公布，如何加工，銷售行為如何進行，珠寶的設計方式及製造。寶石礦物之顏色分類，內含物之特色，光學現象之表現。人造寶石之製造與辨認，均讓學習者有能力鑑定其真偽，價值與市場行為。
description.en: Introduction the physics and chemistry properties of gemstones.

description.zh: 本課程包含1.複合材料的基礎知識：如複合材質及複合過程，複合構造及組織、複合材料的力學性質等基本知識。2.各種複合材料的 介紹，如炭素纖維強化複合材料金屬等複合材料等，原理及應用之 介紹。3.對於尖端技術領域之應用。複合材料大致可區分為高分子 基複材，金屬基複材，陶瓷基複材及纖維複材四種。纖維複材中， 可依強度，韌性和成本需求而選用玻璃纖維、硼纖維、碳纖維、有 機纖維、陶瓷纖維、金屬纖維等作為強化元件。上述各種複材製造 方法，介面結構，機械性質，應用，微觀力學、巨觀力學、強度、 破裂、疲勞和設計均為討論內容。
description.en: The course includes the following items: 1.The basic knowledge of composite materials such as composite materials, composite process and composite structure and tissue, the dynamics property of composite materials. 2.The introduction of all kinds of composite materials, such as the principle and application of reinforced composite material of carbon-fiber. 3.The application of composite materials at the most advanced area.The composite materials approximately can be classified into polymer base composite material, metal base composite material, ceramic base composite material, and fibre composite material. The fiber composite material can be selected as reinforced parts according to strength, toughness and cost requirement, such as glassfiber, boronfiber, carbonfiber, organic fiber, ceramic fiber, metal fiber.The above-mentioned manufacturing method, interface structure, mechanical property, application, microdynamics, macrodynamics, strength, fracture, fatigue and design are all the c

description.zh: 讓學生學習容量、儀器分析及滴定（中和、沉澱、氧化還原、螯化）並運用在高分子，環保檢驗，並讓學生學習儀器的操作保養。
description.en: Included in this course are experiments in precipitation titrimetry, neutralization titrations, complex-formation titrations and oxidation/reduction titrations, and experiments of spectroscopy and chromatography related to polymers and enviroment are also provided.

description.zh: 為使學生對高分子物理有所認識，本課程之設定將涵蓋所有高分子物理之相關課題，其主要內容分以下兩大部份(I)高分子之非結晶性質(II)高分子之結晶性質。而兩大部份中，又各分以下數單元講述:(I) 高分子之非結晶性質(a) 高分子鏈之機率結構(b) 分子鏈之運動方式(c) 高分子熱力學(d) 自由體積理論(含Tg ,Tα,Tβ,Tγ之探討)(e) WLF經通曲線(II)高分子之結晶性質(a) 結晶晶格之分析(b) 高分子結晶度及順向度之估計(c) 結晶度對高分子機械性質，導電性質，及熱性質之影響(d) 溶液晶體與熔融晶體之比較(e) 熱結晶及張力結晶之比較
description.en: This course is designed to make students theroughly understand the problems related to polymer physics. The main content will include two major topics:(I)Amorphous Polymer(II)Crystalline Polymer.The detailed items included in the course are:(I) Amorphous Polymer (a) Random-Walk Theory for Chain Configuration(b) Chain Conformation and Movements(c) Polymer Thermodynamics(d) Free Volume Theory (including the study on Tg ,Tα,Tβ,Tγ…etc.)(e) WLF Master Curve(II)Crystalline Polymer(a) Unit Cell Analysis(b) Polymer Crystallinity and Orientation Measurement(c) Effect of Crystallinity on Mechanical, Dielectrical, and Thermal Properties of Polymeric Materials (d) Solution Crystals vs. Melt Crystals(e) Thermal Induced Nucleation vs. Stress Induced Nucleation.

name.en: Special Topics on Surface Analysis for Materials

description.zh: 本課程介紹各種分析材料表面性質的方法。藉著利用光子、電子、原子、或離子與材料表面的物理或化學作用，來獲得有關材料表面的組成、結構、化學鍵結、電子組態於表面形貌等訊息。所要介紹的表面分析儀器包括；X光電子光譜儀(XPS)、歐傑電子光譜儀（AES）、低能電子繞射儀(LEED)、電子穿隧掃描儀(STM)、表面振動光譜儀(surface vibrational spectroscopy)、程式控溫脫附法(TPD)及真空技術。
description.en: The course introduces various surface analysis methods, including XPS, AES, LEED, STM, surface vibrational spectroscopy, and TPD. From the physical and chemical interaction between photons、electrons、atoms and ions with surfaces, the surface properties, including surface composition, surface structure, surface topography, electronic structure, and chemical bonding will be probed.

name.zh: 綠色化學與潔淨技術特論
name.en: Special Topics on Green Chemistry and Clean Technology

description.zh: 目前永續發展已被視為推動社會和諧、經濟發展和環境保護的共同目標，化學科技則居中扮演一個非常關鍵的角色，因此，這門課程的主要目的是介紹綠色化學與潔淨技術的設計、開發和評估，其中包括：非傳統原料的利用、有利於生態的合成方法、設計更安全的化工產品以及生物合成和生物模擬原理的使用，並從原材料的選擇以至終端產物之整個生產流程，做一完整的評估以了解對人員安全健康以及生態的影響，並與對應的傳統製程相互比較。
description.en: Sustainable development is now accepted as a necessary goal for achieving societal, economic and environmental objectives. Within this chemistry has a vital role to play. Therefore, this course aims to introduce the students to the design, development, and evaluation processes of new Green Chemistry methodologies, and it include: alternative feedstocks, environmentally benign synthetic methodologies, designing safer chemical products, new reaction conditions, alternative solvents and catalyst development, and the use of biosynthesis and biomimetic principles. The students are introduced to the new evaluation process that encompasses the health and environmental impact of a synthetic pathway from choice of starting materials through to target molecule. Furthermore, comparisons and contrasts with classical methodologies are offered as illustrative examples in this course, too.

Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物之中間處理與最終處置之方法與技術為主,使學生瞭                                         解廢棄物妥善清除處理之原理,此包括: 1.廢棄物種類與含義2.廢棄物分類                                         收集與清運3.焚化處理4.固化處理 5.掩埋處置6.特殊處理方法7.廢棄物處理                                         廠之規劃.
description.en: To promote the knowledge of principle for students,the course ,Waste Treatment and                                         Disposal,focuses on middle treatment and final disposal of waste. Contents of the                                         course include:Definition and classification of waste.Storage and                                         transportation,Incineration,Fixation,Landfill and Overall planning of treatmrnt plant.

description.zh: 由於工業發展帶來了各種環境的污染，使自然生態遭到破壞，人類健康受到傷害。本課程為分析汙染原因，並探討如何減輕污染源，以期學習者了解事前防範及事後補救之對策。
description.en: Introduction the methods of environmental protection.

description.zh: 本課程討論，利用儀器分析工作之理論，儀器之原理，構造操作及計算等。包括光譜化學，原子吸收光譜，電漿發射光譜儀，發光光譜儀，電分析化學，PH計，電解沉澱法，伏安法，極譜儀，等儀器之探討。
description.en: This course discusses the theoryof instrumental analysis operation, the principle of instrument, structural operation and calculation. It includes spectrum chemistry, atomic absorption spectrograph, plasma jet spectrograph, light spectrograph, electric analytic chemistry, PH meter, electrolytic precipatation, volt ampere, polar spectrograph, etc..

description.zh: 介紹各種空氣污染現象和議題、探討其成因、對人類與環境的影響、各種空氣污染物之防制技術和其原理、國內外對空氣污染管制之策略與相關法規，最後再特別針對資源開採過程所引發的空氣污染及其防制提供案例說明。本課程乃介紹空氣污染物特性及控制程序、環保法令之課程，以期讓各位同學對空氣污染成因、防制技術及國內外管制政策與法令有基本認識，同時對各位未來繼續研究與就業有所幫助。
description.en: A lots of air pollution are global concern issues in the world. Understanding of air pollution control and health problems, risk assessment, and global atmospheric changes are getting important to everyone.This lecture will introduce sources and impacts of air pollution problems, basic meteorological processes, air quality modeling, air quality measurement/monitoring methods, air pollution control technologies, and relevant air pollution regulations. Finally, this lecture will provide some air pollution control cases focused on mineral mining industries and processes.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生熟悉日常生活英語會話及以正常速度聽講之能力。課程內容取材自學生周遭所熟悉事務, 藉由媒體傳播素材來訓練學生經常聽講之能力，並在課堂中研討其內容以達到運用之目的。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize students with daily spoken English as well as listening and speaking skills. The content includes a wide variety of authentic multimedia materials-printed audio and video texts.  This gives students an opportunity for both recognition of different speaking styles and an in-depth, culture-rich understanding of the topics from multiple perspectives. Real-life situations are rehearsed in the classroom, with role-plays, situational activities, excerpts from newspapers and magazines and interviews with real people. Speaking practices based on day-to-day language are emphasized in class.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程分為兩部分：（1）英文文法觀念的溫故知新，並引導學生將正確的文法觀念運用在閱讀與寫作上，學生可加強基本句型練習、句子改正及句型修正。相關討論包括直述句、引述句、句型變化與修飾;（2）英語修辭法：聽講溝通的有效原理原則。課堂討論主題包括：指稱、一致、倒裝等修辭觀念。修習本課後，學生對出現在相同邏輯意義語境中， 利用不同表達方式以凸顯各種語意的方式與內涵，當有更進一步的體認。
description.en: This course is divided into two parts: (a) The first part is designed for the students to  familiarize themselves with English grammatical framework in relation to reading and writing. A review of grammatical ideas at high level is reinforced by correcting sentence errors, and revising awkward usage of words or sentence structures. The main subjects include English sentence structures, verbal usages, conjunctions, and sequences. Related topics for class discussion cover direct and indirect speech, sentence transformation and modification of sentences; (b) The second half of the course focuses on English rhetoric--principles of effective written and spoken communication. Topics for class discussion include reference, coherence, reverse structures and some related rhetorical concepts. It is hoped that the students will know better the significance brought about by the variations of different expressions that occur in the similar linguistic contexts.

description.zh: 本課程利用新聞教材加強英語字彙能力及聽力技巧, 	內容採用電台、報紙、電視的時事、深度報導和全球議題以增強學生英語知識。同時, 學生亦可獲得各種有用的聽力技巧以加強英語聽力。
description.en: This course is designed to increase vocabulary power and develop listening skills in English through up-to-date news. Current events, in-depth reports as well as global issues from radio, newspapers and T.V are provided to enrich the student's English knowledge. Effective listening skills are reinforced to enhance the student's listening comprehension.

description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level.  Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation, such as though-provoking newspaper, magazine articles, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.en: This course is expected to expand students' writing capacity and experience by helping them to formulate, organize, and present ideas clearly in well-formed paragraphs and compositions.  Students will learn about rewriting, outlining, paraphrasing, synthesizing, documenting, note-taking, writing the draft and editing their own work.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
description.en: This course is expected to expand students' writing capacity and experience by helping them to formulate, organize, and present ideas clearly in well-formed paragraphs and compositions.  Students will learn about rewriting, outlining, paraphrasing, synthesizing, documenting, note-taking, writing the draft and editing their own work.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
description.en: This course is intended for university-level EFL writing students with the aim of increasing their fluency in English writing. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to write varying types of English paragraphs, for instance, paragraphs of definition and paragraphs focusing on cause and effect relationships. In addition, they will have plenty of opportunities to write various kinds of short English essays, including descriptions, narratives, and argumentative writings.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
description.en: This course is intended for university-level EFL writing students with the aim of increasing their fluency in English writing. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to write varying types of English paragraphs, for instance, paragraphs of definition and paragraphs focusing on cause and effect relationships. In addition, they will have plenty of opportunities to write various kinds of short English essays, including descriptions, narratives, and argumentative writings.

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生公開表達之能力，內容包括語言表達基本原則與技巧、肢體語言與演講要領，備題演講及即席演講演練。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to develop the principles and skills necessary for public speaking. Included will be guidelines for giving a speech and displaying body language, and practices for prepared speech and impromptu speech.

description.zh: 本課程介紹研究方法和論文寫作知識，期能培養學生獨立研究和撰寫學術報告、論文的基本能力。主要分為三部份：（一）研究內涵與步驟,（二）主要的研究方法,（三）如何撰寫英文論文及報告。涵蓋主題包括：運用圖書館資源選擇研究主題、研究計劃的撰寫、問卷調查法、訪問法、觀察法、田野工作研究方法、文獻資料分析法（內容分析法）、個案研究法、相關研究法、實驗法、文學研究法，研究報告論文格式與寫作要領，如何撰寫文獻探討，參考書目寫法等。
description.en: This course aims at providing students with the fundamental knowledge and competence that they will need in doing research and writing research papers.  Its main purpose is to familiarize students with methods, procedures, and techniques that are applicable to quantitative and qualitative research as well as to improve their ability to write research papers.  The main topics for instruction include: the research process; major research methods; and the structure of a research paper.  The research methods primarily studied include the experimental method, descriptive research, ethnography, case study, observation, survey research (questionnaire and interviews), content analysis/documentary analysis, and critical approaches to literature.

description.zh: 本課程著重分析中英文之句型, 語法, 慣用語等表達方式及比較其異同之處,並以密集練習及詳細解說交替, 使學生在兩種語言思考間運用自如。
description.en: This course focuses on the presentation of basic syntax, common expression, sentence structure, and an analytical comparison between the methodologies of English and Chinese translation, accompanied with frequent writing practice on students' part.

description.zh: 本課程旨在強化學生口語表達及溝通能力，開拓知識領域以及培養學生的國際觀。由逐步短句，段落至長途步口譯，循序漸進。從入門訣竅如讀稿技巧，筆記要領密集訓練及模擬演練。範圍涵蓋經貿，金融，時事，科技，產業等。
description.en: This course aims to strengthen students' oral expression and communicative abilities in English, broaden knowledge and international views. The course is designed to train the students gradually by using the techniques of Consecutive Interpretation, which starts from short sentences and paragraphs and leads to longer passages. For example, the techniques in sight translation, note-taking and various simulation drills are intensely practiced in class. It ranges from commercial & trade, banking affairs, current events, technologies and production.

name.zh: 進階逐步與同步口譯專業實務

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生中英逐步口譯及會議同步口譯技巧，透過完整專業訓練及密集實務演練，學生所學將可運用於實際企業內口譯、隨行口譯及國際會議口譯。第一階段透過密集演練進階視譯、逐步口譯筆記、記憶分析，學生深化英文理解與口譯之表達能力，學習口譯中傳意不傳詞之精髓。第二階段進入同步口譯教程，學生將認識會議同步口譯之多重任務特質，並將斷句、倒譯、增補、糾正與歸納等同步技巧，運用於實際會議演說之口譯。
description.en: This course aims to introduce students to in-house interpreting, escort interpreting and conference interpreting. Students are familiarized with advanced strategies and techniques in both the consecutive and simultaneous mode of interpreting. Intensive training in sight translation, note-taking and memory retention seek to promote students' listening comprehension and facilitate consecutive interpreting. In simultaneous interpreting sessions, students learn the multitasking nature of the profession and the concept of processing capacity. Practical coping tactics including segmentation, conversion, amplification/omission, correction and induction are also put into practice in interpreting authentic speeches.

name.en: Seminar in Applied Linguistics and Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 應用語言學與文化應用研究相關專題，以邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。
description.en: The Purpose of this course is to enhance students' know-how and research skills in applied linguistics and applied cultural studies. Students will participate in academic speeches and respond to academic papers in group discussion.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 21世紀的工業設計師已不能再靜待市場研究及產品企劃人員提供產品設計規範，而應以使用者代言人、及企業產品開發整合者身分，主動參與產品策略與企劃，並以視覺化技術協助相關人員作橫向溝通。因此，「產品創新設計策略與企劃」課程主要目標在教導學生以「前瞻性的視野」，透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合企業技術及經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品。本課程將以理論、方法、案例研討及個案研究方式進行。
description.en: The function of industrial design in the 21st  century, will no longer waiting for the product definition from the marketing and product planning, It will become a integrator and visualizer during the product innovation strategic phase, and concerning to the user's needs.          	Product Innovation Strategy will guide the enterprise looking beyond their current operation to match their technologies and the distinct competencies with emerging the user and the market needs.The contents of this topic will include theory, methodology, and practical case study.

name.zh: 公共戶外家具設計研究

description.zh: 藉由戶外家具案例之分析探討公共環境與人類行為間之關係及公共戶外家具之材料、造形、人機介面、維護與安全等因素，並經由討論形成公共戶外家具之設計思維。
description.en: Case studies on outdoors furniture design to examine the relationship between open space environment and human behavior. The design factors of material, form, ergonomics, maintenance and safety will be studied. Design philosophy of outdoors furniture is to be deliberating in the discussions.

description.zh: 家具設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved furniture design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

name.zh: 德國設計研究與體驗(一)
name.en: Design Research and Experience in Germany (I)

description.zh: 赴德研習之準備課程；創新設計實務與文化相關之研究，以建立德國設計研究與體驗基礎。課程內容以調查研究德國設計相關設計資源﹐包含學校﹐設計展﹐博物館﹐文化及語言等內容。
description.en: This course provides research of design in Germany related topics on culture and Design. The course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and experiential verification.

description.zh: 課程以人因研究為基礎，分為四個階段：文獻資料收集與分析、人因實驗、創新設計、使用者受測評估實驗。透過系統化人因研究與應用設計之步驟與流程，帶領學生了解人因研究之實驗方法，啟發人本設計概念。
description.en: The course is based on ergonomic. There are four stages: literature review, ergonomic experiment, creative design and evaluation. Students will learn the scientific research method in ergonomic through step by step process.

description.zh: (1)向量分析 (2)靜電場理論：庫倫，高斯定律，電位能，電場能量與功，介電質電場現象，電容 (3)拉普拉斯方程式，電像法、邊界值問題 (4)靜磁場理論：畢沙瓦特，安培定律，磁位能，磁場能量與功，強磁性材料特性電感 (5)電磁感應與馬克斯威爾方程式。
description.en: Course Title:ElectromagnetismDescription:This is an introductory course of electromagnetic bias onits Engineering applications. The course is divided into five parts(1) the static electric field, (2) the steady electric current, (3)the static magnetic field, (4) the quari-stationary electromagneticfield and, (5) Maxwell equations and their applications.Besides, the course also introduces some of the optical technology.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 中文課程共分四年三階段授課。第一年以華語教學為主，授課重點為：（一）華語基本句型句法；（二）華語基本會話；（三）生活語言；（四）標音系統。第二、第三年，除延續第一年華語授課重點外，以段落朗讀和基本認字為主要訓練，並給與中國文字書寫訓練。第四年，加強會話能力，認字與閱讀能力，並傳授中國文化。
description.en: The course of Chinese is categorized as three individual stages for four years. In the first year, the course focuses on : (a) Basic Sentence Patterns, (b) Basic Conversation, (c) Languages in the Real Life and (d) the phonetic system for the Chinese language.In the second and the third year, the training focuses on paragraph reading and term/character recognition-in addition to the teaching themes set in the first year. Writing courses are also added during this stage. In the fourth year, we add more emphasis on the conversational ability, term/character recognition and reading ability. More culture-related information will be included.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數，12.常微分方程。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes : 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series, 12.Ordinary Differential Equation.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidify the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetic, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters, and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是為了：1.驗證物理理論之真實性，2.培養同學認真的科學態度與方法，3.培養同學數據處理的能力，4.啟發同學自行設計解決量度問題的方法。課程之施行分為上下兩學期，每一學期為一學分三小時。上學期的內容偏重力學、波動、熱力、流力之實驗，下學期的內容則偏重電磁、光學、近物之實驗。
description.en: In this course there will be 1 credit for each of two semesters, and 3 laboraborial hours per week. The first semester experiments involve mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, and waves, etc.. The second semester experiments contains electromagnetics, optics, and modern physics, etc.. The purposes of this course are 1: to identify the physical laws, 2:to cultivate the ability of data reduction of students, 4: to instruct the students solving the problems of measurements of measurements by self-designments.

description.zh: 使學生認知測量是各項工程建設的一項重要基礎性先行的工作，使能適應各項測量外業觀測、內業計算及繪圖等作業。課程概要如下：1)測量之基本概念、(2)各種測量儀器的認識與使用、(3)控制測量（括三角、三邊導線高程等)之施測方法及計算、(4)地形圖及地籍圖之測及應用、(5)各項工程放樣測量。
description.en: Theory and practice with compass,transit,level,and stadia.Computations of area,earthwork volumes,and horizontal and vertical curves;astronomical observations;boundary surveying;and map plotting.

description.zh: 配合測量學之講授，作相互之印證，以期融會貫通，落實提昇測量教學之效果。課程概要：(1)各項儀器之使用實習、(2)距離、高程、角度測量實習、(3)控制測量實習、(4) 地形測量實習、(5) 定線實習。
description.en: Theory and practice with compass,transit,level,and stadia.Computations of area,earthwork volumes,and horizontal and vertical curves;astronomical observations;boundary surveying;and map plotting.

description.zh: 本課程將做為大一學生入學後第一門程式語言奠基課程，將教授Unix指令、基礎HTML、網頁編製、及Fortran 90/95程式語言，包括電腦運作概念、程式設計原則、分支敘述、迴圈敘述、輸出、輸入敘述、陣列處理、字元處理、及子程式等課題。
description.en: This is the first programming language course for freshmen that replaces the introductory programming course formerly offered by the department.  The topics covered in this course includes Unix commands, basic introduction to HTML and web pages, basic computer operation, Fortran architecture, branching structures, loops manipulation, input/output concepts, arrays manipulation, characters manipulation, and procedure calls.

description.zh: 介紹單位換算與有效數位，元素的原子結構、化學方程式平衡與計算，反應熱，氣體與氣體定律，大氣層與環境污染，週期表，化學鍵，化合物的分子結構，熱力學，動力學，反應機構，平衡常數，氧化與還原，酸鹼反應，電化學，混合物的分離及現代科技材料，奠定良好化學基礎。
description.en: Introduction to the principles of chemistry and properties of matter, which are explained in terms of modern chemical theory with emphasis on conceptual problems. Individual topics include gas, stoichiometry, atomic structure, chemical bonding, and the states of matter, energy relation, acid-base theory and oxidation-reduction reactions, the chemistry of metallic and nonmetallic elements, nuclear chemistry.

description.zh: 本課程希望讓學生了解如何正確選擇與使用多變項統計方法，並能閱讀、呈現與解釋多變項統計報告或結果。課程包括因子設計、實驗設計、共變數分析、複迴歸等主題，以探討教育研究中多重且同時的影響因素。
description.en: This curriculum lets students understand how to choose and use multi-variance statistics methods exactly.  It also includes that reading, presenting and explaining the report or result of multi-variance statistics analysis exactly.  The topics of the curriculum include that factor design, experimental design, covariance analysis, and multi-regression, al etc. to explore the influence of multi and simultaneous factors in the educational research.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程講授如何使用Westlaw International資料庫進行IP研究。主要的專利資料庫的檢索方式也會展示。在每堂課前，學生必須要閱讀教材。課堂參與是必須的。其他資訊請見英文課程摘要。
description.en: This course is intended to expose students to various research skills for studying IP issues. Primarily, this course teaches how to use the Westlaw International database to do IP research. The framework of the database is based on the legal research methodology applied to American law. So, the basic knowledge of the American legal research methodology will be introduced. In addition, this course will demonstrate major patent databases to students. Students will be assgined to one research project. Students are required to study reading materials before each class. Class participation is also required.

description.zh: 本課程講授與專利寫作有關的法律理論和法律或法規。本課程重點在於美國實務。但是，為了比較的目的，歐洲、臺灣和中國的實務也會涵蓋在本課程內。學生將被要求閱讀法院判決。修課學生不需要有技術背景。課堂參與也是必要的。可能會有書面作業，以練習專利寫作。
description.en: This course teaches a variety of legal doctrines and laws or regulations regarding patent drafting. Primarily, this course focuses on American practices. But, European, Taiwan and China practices are also covered for comparison purposes. Students will be assigned to read court decisions. Technical backgrounds are not required for taking this course. Class participation is also required. Writing assignments regarding patent drafting might be given.

description.zh: 專利攻防已變成產業策略之一，越來越多的訴訟案件逼使廠商進行專利迴避設計。事實上台灣的產業界對於迴避設計、專利策略與專利佈局理論上並不陌生，但在實務上卻很少實際執行，所以每年仍然付出五十億美金的權利金。本課程將從專利範圍解讀開始，熟悉專利的權利範圍，然後介紹專利策略以及佈局的方向，提供專利佈局與專利策略理論及實務經驗。本課程的綱要如下：1.專利權利項解讀2.專利侵權分析流程3.專利迴避設計要件4.專利策略分析5.專利佈局實務6.案例研究
description.en: Patent litigation, either initiation or defense, has become one of the industrial strategies, and more and more patent suit cases have forced the manufacturers to undertake patent design around.  In fact, the industrial fields in Taiwan, theoretically, do not feel strange on design around and patent strategies.  However, in practice, they perform much less.  That is the reason why Taiwan still has to pay more than five billion US dollars each year for royalty.  This course will start from patent claim interpretation, getting patent claims well known, then following with introduction on orientation of patent strategies, and providing theory and practice on patent strategies.  The outline of this course is given as follows:Patent claim interpretation;Process of patent infringement analysis;Requirements of patent design around;Patent strategy analysis;Practice on patent strategies; andStudy on patent cases.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹美國專利制度與美國專利法。由於美國為案例法國家，故除介紹美國專利法之35 U.S.C. §§101-103 and §112等重要法規外，並以相關case law說明美國專利法的實質內涵與精神。修習本課程之學生，於逐步學習到閱讀法律英文之方法後，期於完成本課程時，具有獨力閱讀美國專利案例之能力。
description.en: This course will introduce the U.S. Patent Act and cases, including 35 U.S.C. §101-103, 112, as well as the patent system. Students are expected to read assignments before the class, so that they can answer questions and join discussions in class. Students are expected to learn how to read legal English durning the course and able to read patent cases on their own.

description.zh: n
description.en: n

notes: 蕭玉真、阮啟殷、施立成老師

description.zh: 本課程將以智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為藍本，依「先程序後實體」原則先就「程序審查」部分介紹專利申請之程式，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明專利說明書暨圖式之構成、可專利類型、產業利用性、新穎性、進步性等專利要件，先申請原則、發明單一性、優先權、說明書及圖式之修正、分割申請及改請申請，以及專利權期間延長。
description.en: This course is to introduce the formality examination and the substantive examination based upon the "Patent Examination Guideline" issued by the TIPO, including the formality of the patent application, and the, utility, novelty, inventive steps, first-to-file, priority claim, amendment, divisional application, and the extension of patent term and so on.

description.zh: 網際網路牽涉許多的法律爭議與問題，主要原因在於網際網路環境與一般傳統日常活動不同；而且網路的技術發展迅速，網路上新興的活動呈現多樣與多變之性質，亦使傳統法律無法應付層出不窮的網路行為。本課程除將探討一般網路法律之規定外，並將引領學生針對現今爭議的問題，應適用何種法律或應新增訂、或修訂法律，作深入探討。期使學生於本課程中，除了解到一般網路法律外，對於新的網路議題，應能夠作相關的分析與探討。
description.en: In the information age many legal issues related to the Internet result from the differences between the Internet and conventional activities. Compared with the conventional activities, the nature of activities on the Internet is changing more rapidly and more diversely. In this course I would like to introduce some important issues of cyberlaw and some current issues as well. Students will learn some relevant regulations of cyberlaw and have the abilities to analyze the new legal issues on the Internet in the end.

description.zh: 本課程將以智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為藍本，依「先程序後實體」原則先就「程序審查」部分介紹專利申請之程式，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明專利說明書暨圖式之構成、可專利類型、產業利用性、新穎性、進步性等專利要件，先申請原則、發明單一性、優先權、說明書及圖式之修正、分割申請及改請申請，以及專利權期間延長案。
description.en: This course is to introduce the formality examination and the substantive examination based upon the "Patent Examination Guideline" issued by the TIPO, including the formality of the patent application, and the allowable subjects for patent, utility, novelty, inventive steps, first-to-file, priority claim, amendment, divisional application, and the extension of patent term and so on.

description.zh: 本課程主要關注台灣專利申請的程序觀點。其相關的主題包括發明人身份、專利權人（專利申請權人）身份、優先權、申請格式、發明人訪談、審查意見答覆寫作、訴願狀寫作和專利申請策略。此外，國際專利申請的實務觀點也會在課堂上討論以做為比較。本課程教材包括專利申請教科書、各國專利申請基準、和法院判決等。
description.en: This course focuses on the procedural aspect of the patent prosecution in Taiwan. The topics cover inventorship, ownership (including a right to file a patent application), priority, formality, inventor interview, office action response drafting, petition brief drafting, and patent filing strategy.  In addition, the practical aspect of international patent prosecution is presented for comparison. The class materials include a patent prosecution textbook, patent examination guidelines from different counties, and court decisions.

description.zh: n
description.en: n

description.zh: 民法總則介紹民法中的共通概念與基本原則，為整部民法以及所有法律的學習基礎。透過民法總則之學習，同學可以熟悉法律的思考模式及規範架構。本課程將以理論與實務並重方式協助同學學習。
description.en: The General Principle of the Civil Law serves to introduce the common concept and fundamental principle of the Civil Law.  In short, the General Principle of the Civil Law predominates as a learning basis for the whole Civil Law and all legal study.  Through learning on the General Principle of the Civil Law, students can be familiar with the model of legal thought and the framework of norm.  This course aims to assist students learning from both theory and practice.

description.zh: 以講授刑法基本概念的犯罪論、罪數論及刑罰論為主軸；並輔以相關案例的檢討、分析，以使同學對於抽象的概念及學理，得以理解及適用。目的除在強化同學對維護個人、社會、國家等法益的體認外，亦在奠定學習刑法各論的基礎。
description.en: The course focuses on the introduction to the fundamental ideas of the criminal law such as the criminal theory, crime arithmetic and punishment theory. Many relevant cases are presented in the class for further discussion and analysis. The ultimate objective of the course is not only to enhance the students a deeper understanding of the rights granted to individuals, society and nations, but also to equip them with a wider knowledge base ready for a further studying on each specific section of the Criminal Law.

description.zh: 依據提供服務準則,工程師們須以誠實公平公正正當和奉獻保護公共健康,安全及幸福。工程師們必須以專業標準的行為履行最高的倫理準則。本課程以（1）工程倫理概述（2）衝突與抉擇（3）守則與解說（4）個案分析，提供學生瞭解及研析。
description.en: Accordingly, the services provided by engineers require honesty, impartiality, fairness, and equity and must be dedicated to protection of the public health, safety and welfare. Engineers must perform under a standard of professional behavior that require adherence to the highest principles of ethical conduct. This course offers (1).Description of engineering ethics (2).Conflict and selection (3).Rule and explanation (4).Case study for student studied.

notes: 博雅選修課程-哲學向度

description.zh: 先修課程：3002010或負責教授同意。鑄造用材料、鑄鐵、鑄鋼及非鐵金屬之鑄造、鑄造品之熱處理、特殊鑄造程序及方法。
description.en: Pattern, Molding Processes and Materials, Molding Processes, Cores, Solidification of Metals, Principles of Metallurgy,  Gating Systems Pouring, Materials for Foundry Engineering,  Casting Steel and Non-metals, Heat treatment of Casting Works, Special Casting Processes and Methods etc.

description.zh: 本課程首先將建立學生對原子模型的觀念，進而學習相關核反應、中子物理及核反應器物理之相關基本知識。內容包括：物質基本概念、原子模型發展、物質與波、電子軌域、化學鍵、量子數、鮑立不相容原理、氫原子模型、質能不滅、守恆定律、原子與核、核反應、放射線與衰變、放射性與物質作用等。
description.en: The purpose of this lecture will firstly help the students to establish the concept of atomic model. It will further provide students to lean the fundamental knowledge in nuclear reactions, neutron physics, and nuclear reactor physics. Basic material and concept to be covered are: atomic model evolution, matter and wave, electronic orbits, chemical bond, quantum number, Pauli exclusion principle, hydrogen model, conservation law, atom and nucleus, nuclear reaction, radiation and decay, interaction between radiation and matter,…etc.

notes: 四機三甲乙丙合開,限50人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。  數位系統簡介，數字系統及編碼，基本邏輯操作，數位積體電路設計，布氏代數與卡諾圖，組合電路設計與應用，正反器，暫存器，順序電路設計與應用，計數器與計時器，多工器與解多工器，記憶體，微處理機架構簡介。
description.en: Introduction to Digital Circuits, Digital Systems and Coding, Basic Logic Operations,  Boolean Algebra and K-Map, Combinational Logic Circuits, Flip-Flop, Register, Sequential Circuit Design and Applications, Counter  and Timer, Multiplexer and Demultiplexer, Shit Register and Memory, Introduction to Micro-processor.

description.zh: 本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

notes: 碩士班畢業門檻,限碩班學生修

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體材料、二極體、電晶體的原理、邏輯IC、記憶體IC。如物理沈積(PVD)、化學沈積(CVD)、高溫處理、微影、蝕刻及其相關設備介紹、廠物、維修、管理及工安等。IC封裝及測試。
description.en: Introduction to semiconductor material, diode, transistor, logic IC and memory IC, etc. description of the operation principles technology and related facilities about semiconductor fabrication processes, such as Physical vapor deposition (PVD), chemical vapor deposition (CVD), doping , oxidation , heat process, lithography , and etching etc., discussion of utilities, maintenance, management and industrial safety in the factory. Discussion of IC packaging and testing.

name.zh: 塑膠射出成形與模具實務
name.en: Plastic injection molding and mold practices

description.zh: (1)塑膠材料種類、特性、及其應用；(2)塑膠的成形方法；(3)塑膠射出成形品設計；(4)   射出成形機的分類與規格；(5)射出成形模具的機構；(6)射出成形模具零件規格與選用；  (7)成形品的缺陷與對策。
description.en: (1) Plastic materials types, characteristics, and applications. (2) Forming methods of plastic materials. (3) Part design of injection molding. (4) Classification and specification of injection molding machine. (5) Mechanism of injection mold. (6) Injection mold's parts and part selection. (7) Defects and strategy.

description.zh: (1)熟悉3D塑膠產品設計；(2)學會應用2D與3D軟體的操作模具設計與拆模；(3)射出成形模具的構造元件之規格與設計；(4)模具零件分解圖；(5)模具組立圖。
description.en: (1) To realize the 3D plastic molding part's design. (2)Mold design and dissolution by 3D CAD software. (3) Injection mold parts design and specification. (4) The explosion diagram of mold parts. (5) Injection mold assembly.

description.zh: 本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

notes: 碩士班畢業門檻,限碩班學生修

description.zh: 傳統電廠與核電廠比較、核電廠發電原理、NSSS、BOP、壓力槽與內部組件、核燃料與控制棒、核電廠控制系統、熱傳與冷卻系統、屏蔽與多重防禦、圍阻體、餘熱移除之系統、中子偵檢、第四代反應器、其他安全系統、等。
description.en: The course contents include: basis of nuclear power plant, NSSS, BOP, reactor pressure vessel and internal components, nuclear fuel and control rod assembly, reactor control, heat transfer and coolant system, shielding and multilayer containments, residual heat removal system, neutron detection system, other safety related system, Gen-IV reactors, … etc.

notes: 四機四甲乙丙合開,限60人

description.zh: 修習內容包含：核能科技演進對人類的啟發、核能與輻射、輻射線與物質之互應作用、核能基本理論、核能應用與核能發電原理、以及核反應器原理。.
description.en: The contents of this course consists of: the evolution of the nuclear technology, nuclear energy and radiations, interactions of radiation with matters, basic nuclear theory, nuclear applications and the basic working mechanisms of the nuclear power generation, and nuclear reactor theory.

notes: 四機四甲乙丙合開,限50人

description.zh: 本課程講述瞭解國際標準驗證之觀念。國際標準驗證目前有一般通用的項目，如ISO9001:2008、ISO14001:2004、OHSAS18001:2007等各種類型；另外專業方面如資安為ISO27001，食品安全為ISO22000等。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of confirmation of international standard. The general purpose of confirmation of international standard including ISO9001, ISO14001, and OHSAS18001, the other is professional field, such as information safety (ISO27001), foodstuff safety (ISO22000).

description.zh: 機械振動、非線性振動、振動量測、振動抑制及隔離技術、振動與波之傳播、聲音之反射及折射、噪音之降低及吸音材料、消音器與噪音控制、法規及環境等。
description.en: Topics include: Mechanical vibration, Vibration  transmission, Vibration measurement, The use of vibration isolators and absorbers, Fundamentals of acoustics, Noise control engineering, Instrumentation and Law.

description.zh: 本課程介紹用以發展與分析三維空間多體運動學與動力學的觀念, 定義, 與技巧. 主要課題包括計算動力學簡介, 剛體運動學, 動態方程的構成, 侷限動力學與空間動力學等.
description.en: This course introduces the concepts, definitions, and techniques used for developing and analyzing kinematics and dynamics of multibody in three dimensions. The main topics include introduction of computational dynamics, kinematics of rigid bodies, forms of the dynamic equations, constrained dynamics and spatial dynamics. ematics and dynamics of multibody in three dimensions. The main topics include introduction of computational dynamics, kinematics of rigid bodies, forms of the dynamic equations, constrained dynamics and spatial dynamics.

description.zh: 本課程內容主要包括核能電廠系統熱流、結構應力與安全分析、量化風險評估(PRA)兩主要部份：系統熱流、結構應力與安全分析內容主要包括核反應器系統描述，流體系統分析，核反應器熱的產生與熱流學，核能電廠熱水力學，應力分析。透過PRA技術可全面檢討核能電廠潛在弱點，該部分的內容包括PRA技術在核能電廠系統、風險管制、用過核燃料處置等之應用。
description.en: This lecture will mainly covers the thermal-hydraulics, structure stress & safety analysis, and the modern methods for probabilistic and risk assessment (PRA) for nuclear power plants (NPPs).Thermal hydraulics, structure stress & safety analysis will cover: description of nuclear power systems; fluid flow system, thermal and structural analysis of reactor core and plant components; thermal-hydraulic analysis of accidents in nuclear power plants.The weakness of nuclear power plants can be identified through the PRA technology. Content of PRA will cover basic concept of probability, applications to the reliability assessment of components, event-tree and fault-tree analysis, uncertainty analysis and its propagation, etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。探討：專利有效性法規、專利案例閱讀與分析、專利侵害鑑定要點、專利侵權鑑定實務、專利迴避性設計、智財法院審理模式、智財審理法。
description.en: Discussing the patent act, patent infringement analysis, and patent identification. The course includes: patent act about patent validity, patent cases analysis, patent infringement identification guide, patent infringement identification practice, patent design around, intellectual property court trial mode, and intellectual property case adjudication act.

notes: 機電所和最後一哩合開

description.zh: 機械動態系統及表示法、變分原理(Variational Principles)、Lagrange方程式、Hamilton原理、系統分析、迴歸性判別法、判別法則及選定、控制應用。
description.en: Dynamical system representation and Modeling of Mechanical systems, Variational Principles Lagrange equation, Hamiltion Principles, System Analysis, System Identification and Application.

description.zh: 偏微分方程式、變分法、張量分析、工程統計及積分方程式等工程分析用工具知識。
description.en: Partial Differential equation, Variation Principle, Tensor Analysis, Engineering Statistics and Integral equation.

notes: 乙組 6選2 機電所和製科所合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。精密機械之機械控制、電氣控制、數值控制、幾何數據處理、驅動系統、適應控制系統、監視系統與診斷系統、機器人控制、電腦整合精密機械系統。
description.en: Mechanical control, electrical control, numerical control, geometric data processing, drive systems, adaptive control systems, monitoring and diagnostic systems, and Computer Integrated precision Machinery Systems.

notes: 機電所和製科所合開,製科所12選3,限20人

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要在提供學生有關計算機系統之基本知識及應用。授課內容包括：1.電腦的演進  2 .電腦的硬體架構(內部組件、中央處理機及主記憶體、輸出入裝置、資料儲存媒介與裝置)  3. 電腦的軟體(電腦系統概述、作業系統、資料組織與檔案處理、程式語言簡介、程式設計與軟體開發、資訊系統設計與發展程序)  4.計算機的應用。
description.en: This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers, including, 1.the evolution of  computers, 2.computer hardware structure , 3.computer software & applications.

notes: 工程學士班補修,計網電腦教室

description.zh: 本課程主要是介紹最新的製造技術。利用物理式及化學式的製造方法來加工新進材料，使用新進光電能源及新進製造工具如雷射、鑽石、電子束、離子束、電漿、化學反應劑等，適應生產微小精密工件之需求，由冶金技術製造的材料與產品包括：高熔點材料、超硬質材料、超耐熱材料、燒結機械另件、燒結摩擦材料、燒結磁性材料等，以期讓學過冶金課程的學生，能進一步對製造技術之應用有更多的了解。
