description.zh: 生命禮俗是為個人各重要人生階段所舉行的儀禮，對當事者而言，不單是生命階段性標誌，更是社會關係與責任重新建立的起點。在華人社會，周代貴族的冠昏喪葬之禮，一向奉為現代生命禮俗的源頭，將近三千年以來，改變的多是禮儀外在形式，其實質內涵大體不變。因此，本課程採用古今對照方式，分就出生禮、成年禮、婚禮、喪禮，介紹其源流與意義，以呈現傳統文化獨特的生命價值觀，並反思生命禮俗在文化活動設計時之轉化應用。
description.en: This course is divided into four parts which are birth ceremony, rite of passage, weddings and funerals. We will introduce their origin and meaning to present a unique traditional culture of life values, and reflect the transformation and application between life rituals and cultural activities.

description.zh: 課程目標:透過歐、美、日及台灣傑出攝影家之專題攝影作品賞析，結合實務創作與討論。培養學生對於專題影像的認識及從事專題攝影創作之職能。課程內容:專題攝影概述、專題攝影作品賞析、實務創作與討論。作品賞析與討論將試圖含括地方誌型專題、人類學及社會學式專題、戰爭與事件紀錄專題、城市專題、地景式專題、編導式專題、廢墟專題，歐美近代及當代攝影家系列、東北亞漢字圈國家 (台灣、中國大陸、日本、韓國) 近代及當代攝影家系列等討論。惟需視學生創作進度適時調整。教學方式:各類型專題攝影作品、經典攝影集及影片賞析、課堂講授、作品創作與討論。
description.en: This course will combine the practical creation with discussion, and students can appreciate the photography from some distinguished photographers who are from Europe, the United States, Japan and Taiwan. Moreover, students will be trained to know the thematic image, and to engage in the creative photography.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the IE related journals.  The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:印尼文化與語言
name.en: Development of global perspective: Indonesian culture and language

description.zh: 為了迎接全球化的亞洲國家與東南亞國家之間的經濟發展,藉由傳授印尼語言,讓學生掌握印尼語同時也了解印尼文化作為兩國的經濟橋樑，以此來協助學生前往印尼就業。本課程是培養學生的溝通能力，以運用印尼語來跟印尼母語者打招呼、建立人際關係、購物、敘述事物…等。
description.en: In order to embrace economic development of globalization, especially in Asian and Southeast Asian countries, there is a need to teach Indonesian (Bahasa Indonesia) and equip students not only with the language but also to understand the culture as an economic bridge between the two countries. And, it is hoped that assisting students in employment in Indonesia.This course will aim to help students to develop communication skills by utilizing Indonesian language to speak to native speakers in terms of greeting, business contact establishment, interpersonal communication, and descriptive usage…etc.

notes: 四光四和最後一哩合開,10月3日開始上課,三789節上課

name.zh: 國際觀培養-馬來文化與語言
name.en: Emerging Market Series: Getting to know Malaysia

description.zh: 在全球金融海嘯後，已開發國家經濟成長趨緩，新興亞洲國家特別是東協五國經濟成長迅速，藉由傳授東南亞四小語以協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖並促進台灣與東南亞國家之間的經貿關係。本課程旨在培養學生的基本溝通能力，運用馬來語來與當地馬來母語者打招呼、了解馬來文化、建立人際關係、購物、敘述事物…等，以此來協助學生前往馬來西亞就業作為兩國的經濟橋樑。
description.en: In order to embrace economic development of globalization, especially in Asian and Southeast Asian countries, there is a need to introduce and equip our students not only with the basic local language but also to understand the local culture so as to strengthen the economic tie between Taiwan and the Asian countries and to enhance the employment opportunities of our students in these Asian countries.This course aims to help students to understand and develop basic communication skills by utilizing Bahasa Malaysia (Malaysian language) to communicate with Malaysian in terms of greeting, business contact establishment, interpersonal communication, etc. Historical and geographical backgrounds of Malaysia and their local cultures will also be introduced.

notes: 四土四乙和最後一哩合開,限30人

description.zh: 商業法規其範圍非常廣泛，包括公司、票據、海商與保險四法。首先讓學生掌握商業法規法之基本法律原則，並透過生活報導來對照，增加學生學習商業法規之樂趣。其次分別就公司法、票據法、保險法與海商法之順序並輔以國內知名案例，使學生理論與實務相結合。
description.en: Commercial Law is the most closest business law with people. Due to it's breadth and depth, including Corporate Law, Instruments Law , Insurance Law, Maritime Law, we have to let students know basic concepts of Corporate law well and compare with life news in point. After assimilation of Corporate law, Instruments Law , Insurance Law, Maritime Law theories, we teach students about famous cases and combine theories.

notes: 四管二和最後一哩合開,四ABC節上課【停開】

name.zh: 臺灣資訊業運作與挑戰-職場須知
name.en: Challenges faced of Taiwan ICT Industry

description.zh: 以接近企業界實務經驗方式,提供學生就職前對ICT產業的基本認識,並培養學生在企業內簡報能力COURSE 1: 講師自我介紹  學生分組  課程目的說明  課程安排說明COURSE 2: ICT產業環境與基本認知-1COURSE 3: ICT產業環境與基本認知-2COURSE 4: 品質意識與品牌基礎概念COURSE 5: 資訊吸收方法與終身學習COURSE 6: 學員發表與評分
description.en: To provide students a general understanding of how Taiwan ICT industry operates and its challenges before entering job market. COURSE 1: IntroductionCOURSE 2: ICT industry environment -1COURSE 3: ICT industry environment -2COURSE 4: Quality and brandCOURSE 5: Lifelong learningCOURSE 6: Final presentation

notes: 四子四和最後一哩合開,雙週四ABC節上課

name.zh: 國際觀培養-越南文化與語言
name.en: Development of global perspective:Vietnam culture and language

description.zh: 在全球金融海嘯後，已開發國家經濟成長趨緩，新興亞洲國家-東協國家經濟成長迅速，本課程將以越南語教學為主，越南經貿、觀光文化及越語字母拼音教學，讓學生在學習越語的同時，深入了解越南文化，協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖。
description.en: This series of courses aim to provide students with opportunities to understand emerging markets in a global context. Global economy in the post-recession world relies heavily on emerging economies, in particular countries in Southeast Asia known as ASEAN. Seeing the greater potential for economic gains and development, we build up the courses from introducing the fundamentals, including but not limited to, their economy, culture, tourism and people with special emphasis on the use of the language for communication along with its relevance to Taiwan as a trading partner.

name.zh: 國際觀培養-泰國文化與語言
name.en: Development of global perspective: Thai language and culture

description.zh: 在東南亞地區，泰國自古以來是個重要的營運中心之國。臺灣和泰國具有密切關係，每一年有不少的臺灣人到泰國去旅遊與投資設工廠，且台商是泰國目前所投資最大的，位局第三，僅次於美國與日本。同時也有很多泰國人到臺灣來工作與觀光，根據駐台北泰國經濟文化辦事處（勞工局）的統計，在臺灣的泰國勞工曾經高達十二萬人。因此，我們不能否認泰國與臺灣往來的重要與衝擊，而應該更進一步去了解泰國與東南亞國家之間的各方面，如：文化、思想、歷史、政治、經濟，透過「語言」這個重要「鑰匙」瞭解其他文化。本課程能讓學生學習到基本泰語和泰文，包括泰語文字、文法、句型結構、聽力、閱讀、發音以及常用語等項目。再者是泰國文化、歷史、風俗民情的基本常識。在全球金融海嘯後，已開發國家經濟成長趨緩，新興亞洲國家-東協十國經濟成長迅速，本課程將以泰語教學為主，泰國經貿、觀光文化及泰語字母韻母教學，讓學生在學習泰語的同時，深入了解泰國文化，協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖。
description.en: In south-east Asia, Thailand is a very important centre of transportation. Taiwan and Thailand have profound relationship to each other, there are many Taiwanese go to Thailand for traveling and investing, even get a job and become resident after retired, and Taiwan businessman has become a big investor just less than America and Japan. Meanwhile, there are many Thais work and travel in Taiwan. According to the statistic of Thailand Economics and Culture office of Taipei, Thai laborers have been higher than 120,000 in Taiwan in past years. With the closed relationship, we should learn through "language", which is a golden-key for cultural experience, moreover in thought, history, politics, economics aspects. From this course, you could learn more about Thai basic language and Thai literally, included consonants, vowels, grammar, syntax, listening, reading, speaking, and etc. In addition, culture, history, custom, and so on are the fundamental topics.

name.zh: 就業達人講座-職前大補帖

description.zh: 本校為強化學生的就業能力，加強學生對就業職場的認識，開設「就業達人講座-職前大補帖」之課程，藉由業界主管與人員分享勞工權益、面試、印象管理、職場生涯規劃等議課題，提昇學生對於職場的認識，並進一步強化學生的就業競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students to familiarize the requirement of the current employment , strengthening their competitive ability in future. The course contents include the labors' rights, interview methods, impressed management and the planning of the career life,etc. By the topics, it is hopeful to assist students in comprehending the cognition of the employment of the employment for all kinds of industries.

notes: 四光四、光電所和最後一哩合開,周三ABC節上課

name.zh: 精彩創新-華碩追尋無與倫比系列

description.zh: 本課程將從理論與實務的角度與同學分享: 華碩致力於提供每位客戶最佳3C解決方案，以追尋無與倫比為目標，探究未來使用情境，結合深厚的研發實力與工藝設計，打造創新產品，並透過專業行銷，提升華碩品牌的心佔率與市佔率。
description.en: Inspiring Innovation o Persistent Perfection (IIPP) is the ASUS brand promise. During this lecture, The senior managers from ASUS would like to share with students: ASUS commits itself to providing the best 3C solutions to all users. With focus on understanding the needs of people and the strong R&D, design and marketing capabilities, ASUS hopes to garner mindshare as well as market share.

notes: 四光四、光電所和最後一哩合開,周二ABC節上課

name.zh: 國際觀培養:印尼文化與語言
name.en: Emerging Market Series: Getting to know Indonesian

description.zh: 為了迎接全球化的亞洲國家與東南亞國家之間的經濟發展,藉由傳授印尼語言,讓學生掌握印尼語同時也了解印尼文化作為兩國的經濟橋樑，以此來協助學生前往印尼就業。本課程是培養學生的溝通能力，以運用印尼語來跟印尼母語者打招呼、建立人際關係、購物、敘述事物…等。
description.en: In order to embrace economic development of globalization, especially in Asian and Southeast Asian countries, there is a need to teach Indonesian (Bahasa Indonesia) and equip students not only with the language but also to understand the culture as an economic bridge between the two countries. And, it is hoped that assisting students in employment in Indonesia.This course will aim to help students to develop communication skills by utilizing Indonesian language to speak to native speakers in terms of greeting, business contact establishment, interpersonal communication, and descriptive usage…etc.

notes: 四光四.光電所合開,10月3日開始上課,三789節上課

description.zh: 從台灣史前陶、原住民陶、交趾陶、磚瓦、傳統日用陶等單元認識豐富的傳統陶瓷藝術；由實地參訪、實際製作中體認陶瓷與台灣歷史文化的關聯。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to enable the students to get acquinted with the rich tranditional ceramic art from units of the indigenous pottery, Cochin Ceramic, Bricks and Tiles, daily pottery, etc.  Students will know the relationships between the Ceramic Art and Taiwanese Culture by field studies and hand-making courses.

description.zh: 以日本歷史為主軸，專題探討日本文化與社會之特質。一. 美學意識二. 生死觀三. 武士道四. 傳統文化：藝術(花道、茶道)              藝能(歌舞伎、能與狂語)              運動(相撲、柔道、空手道)五. 生活習慣與行動樣式：集團歸屬志向                        序列社會                        宗教六. 飲食生活七. 動漫產業
description.en: The main topic of this course is Japanese history, and to explore the characteristics of the Japanese culture and society.

description.zh: 故事，讓世界充滿了魅力 。 一個人，一個景，一剎那的印象，一段文字的愛戀，甚至只是一個微笑……都是故事的元素，哈佛大學教授Howard Gardnerh曾說：「講故事是最簡單，卻最具有凝聚力的工具。」但是如何將故事與創意具體的表達出來，不但需要大量的閱讀，從故事中汲取更多的啟發與思考，並且掌握故事的「類型」與「母題」，學習以邏輯方式組織想法，進而加強基本的文字與口語傳播的能力，都是本課程的目標；因此「故事原理」的課程設計，將理論與實務並重，包含：（一）各類故事原型的分析及討論。（二）故事文本的延伸閱讀和理論教學。（三）創意技術與經典故事改寫與應用。
description.en: N

description.zh: 本課程旨在引介文化地景(Cultural Landscapes)相關討論中的核心議題、重要實例與研究、應用趨勢。課程中援引來自人文地理學、社會學、博物館、文化研究等領域的重要思辯，發揮文化地景討論的跨學科特質，並以之做為文化地景保存(preservation)、詮釋(interpretation)與活化再利用(revitalisation and reuse)多項實務案例的分析架構。本課程設計三大教學單元-「關鍵論述」、「意義的生產與消費－詮釋新觀」與「活化再利用－個案分析」。除課堂講授外，亦將透過分組報告、問題與討論、影片賞析與實地參訪等教學活動，協助同學們學習文化地景保存的跨域特質與多重面向，並進一步運用批判思考及分析能力，以工作小組型式，選定文化地景案例，合作提出詮釋規畫與設計。
description.en: The course aims to introduce key issues, examples, research and application related to the studies of cultural landscapes. The introduction includes discussions and debates from human geography, sociology, museology and cultural studies, thus highlighting the interdisciplinary nature of cultural landscapes studies. These discussions and debates also form the analytical framework with which the preservation, interpretation, revitalisation and reuse of cultural landscapes will be examined in the course. Divided into three sections, Key Issues, Meaning Making and Consumption, and Revitalisation and Reuse, the course will be conducted with activities including group presentations, discussions, and field visits, to facilitate the understanding of various aspects of cultural landscapes preservation.

description.zh: 本課程的授課目標為培育新一代之交通工具設計工程師所需要之基礎知識與實務技能。交通工具設計是一門跨領域先進知識與技術整合的工程，也是進階的專業設計學問。因此本課程將以實作為基礎，訓練學生如何從無中生有、工程藍圖之計畫及工程上的執行，以完全符合交通工具設計實務上國際要求之標準。學生可從中學習如何設計並實現自己的創作，並培養時程掌握、執行藍圖與油土工程、模具開發技術養成以及部品組裝之能力。
description.en: This course aims to train students to be capable of transportation design practice. Transportation design is a cross-discipline engineering which integrates advanced technology and knowledge. This practice based course allows students to learn and execute all the tasks involved in the professional to meet the international standard, through creative concept development, blueprint drawing, clay modeling and mold making.

notes: 四車三四、創意三四年級與最後一哩合開,實習在綜科B05

description.zh: 本課程的授課目標為培育新一代之交通工具設計工程師所需要之基礎知識與實務技能。交通工具設計是一門跨領域先進知識與技術整合的工程，也是進階的專業設計學問。因此本課程將以實作為基礎，訓練學生如何從無中生有、工程藍圖之計畫及工程上的執行，以完全符合交通工具設計實務上國際要求之標準。學生可從中學習如何設計並實現自己的創作，並培養時程掌握、執行藍圖與油土工程、模具開發技術養成以及部品組裝之能力。
description.en: This course aims to train students to be capable of transportation design practice. Transportation design is a cross-discipline engineering which integrates advanced technology and knowledge. This practice based course allows students to learn and execute all the tasks involved in the professional to meet the international standard, through creative concept development, blueprint drawing, clay modeling and mold making.

notes: 四車三四、創意三四年級與最後一哩合開,實習在綜科B05

description.zh: 本課程為財務會計領域之進階課程，針對已具初級會計學之學生深入講授財務會計之理論、觀念、方法及程序。本課程全面納入國際財務報導準則(IFRS)﹐內容包括：介紹財務報導觀念架構、主要財務報表編製、講解資產負債表中有關資產、負債、股東權益以及現金流量表與租賃會計等，修習本課程可使學生對IFRS有全面整體了解及運用之能力,亦有助於將來參加會計乙級、記帳士及公務人員高考等證照考試。
description.en: This curriculum enters the step curriculum for the financial accounting. Intermediate accounting requires ever increasing knowledge and refinement of skills. Our goal is to achieve the most educational effective blend of concepts and practice relation to the current intermediate accounting body of knowledge. This course strives to provide the material needed to understand this subject area using IFRS. It may also be helpful to participate in accountant the license test and the government workers examination.

description.zh: 本課程敦請不同類屬之文化事業、創意產業之經營者，採產學協同教學模式，以實務操作和職能訓練為主要授課內容。旨在協助學生循序漸進，學習產業實務和相關應用技術，強化未來職場競爭力。
description.en: The main teaching content of this course is the practical operation and the functional training. We invite operators of cultural undertakings and the creative industries to help students learn industry practices and application of technology. This course is designed to strengthen students’ competitiveness in the future.

description.zh: 幫助同學了解投資的理論與實務發展,訓練分析能力與培養正確投資觀念：投資學基礎、固定收益證券、權益證券、投資組合分析與管理、衍生性金融商品與風險管理
description.en: To introduce the developments of investment theories and practice to the students and try to enhance their analysis ability. ＊concepts of investment＊fixed-income securities＊equity securities＊portfolio theory and analysis＊financial derivatives and risk management

description.zh: 建立設計專業用日文基礎；日文發音、拼音、基本句型、詞類文法及設計專業日文導讀，用以唸讀及理解設計專業相關日文。
description.en: Introducing the alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of Japanese to building the capability of reading and understanding the design based Japanese.

description.zh: 透過多類型之作業演練，分析及探討由視覺衍生之知覺性及感情效果於平面設計上之影響，開發一套可供工業設計運用的基本視覺設計原裡。
description.en: Through multiple creative design projects, analyzing and discussing visual cognition affect graphic design work, Develop a basic system of visual communication usage for industrial design.

description.zh: 以國內外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students ' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 選修哲學,教師陸品妃,醫大2205教室

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

name.zh: 有限元素法在大地工程之應用
name.en: Finite Element Method in Geotechnical Engineering

description.zh: 有限元素法常被用來模擬基礎施工、開控支撐及山坡地開控的過程，預估土壤或岩盤的變形行為，研判或分析施工的安全性。本課程的內容除了講授有限元素法的基本理論，尚須以大地工程的案例作為實際推導公式理論之演練。其案例包括滲流問題、壓密沉陷問題及土石結構穩定分析等等。
description.en: Finite element method ha been widely used to simulae the process of foundation construction, cut and bracing and excavation etc, and to predict and analyze the construction safety. This course should include the basic theory and sfiffues matrix formulation, in addition, geotechnical engineering problem are in addition, geotechical engineering problems are used to help students to understand the basic theory and code formulation. These examle problems includes seepage, consolidation and earth structure stability analyses.

class.name: 土木環境外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程將針對如何從土壤動力試驗評估土壤的動態力學參考數導入,作為理論解或者數值解的輸入值,以預測土壤在震動下的變形行為,以及分析土壤與結構物的動態互制行為.內容包括:波傳遞理論,土壤的動力性質,土壤的液化,基礎的振動問題,等等..
description.en: This course will teach how to evaluate the soil's dynamic material properties by means of dynamic laboratory testing.Based on the analytical and numerical solution,the behaviour of soil-structure dynamic interaction can be predicted.

class.name: 土木環境外國學生專班

description.zh: 以國內外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students ' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.en: Studies of actual member behavior;members in flexure,combined flexure,shear,and torsion;bond and anchorage;combined axial load and flexure;slender columns;deep beams;derivation of current code provisions.

description.zh: 本課程說明受壓構件之挫屈及挫屈後之線性及非線性行為及分析。整體挫屈及局部挫屈亦分別探討，圖使學生建立結構穩定之整體觀念。
description.en: To demonstrate the linear and nonlinear behaviore as well as analysis of buckling and postbuckling problems for pressed members. Both overall and local buckling are investigated.It is aimed to established an integrated idea for students at structural stability.

class.name: 土木環境外國學生專班

name.en: Security and management of underground space

description.zh: 隨著人口的增加以及集中都市化的演進，利用地下空間已經是必然的趨勢，居住、商場、倉儲、交通、導排水等等，非但數量激增，甚且規模亦趨龐大。而地下空間因自然條件與進出、通路所限，無論維護、安全或管理都異於地面上的開放空間。台灣近年來的急遽發展，各類地下空間也急速增長，安全維護管理面更因人權的要求而益受關注。本課程即為因應此趨勢，而從地下空間的特異性開始，再以災害案例引入，尤其是以不確定性最高的公路隧道的火災消防搶救為主，整合土木、機電、營管、安全等不同領域知識，以貫串整學期的課程。內容簡述如下：一.地下空間之分類二.火災案例三.通風、照明系統簡介四.監控系統五.消防系統六.安全維護管理制度七.消防搶救本課程的目標在提供學生認知工程技術與營運管理及消防領域間整合性介面，引導學生從規劃設計階段即應思考人性化營運管理思維，成為全方位之未來工程師。
description.en: As the increasing number of population are living in the big cities, housing, shopping malls, warehousing, transportation, water supply and drainage are growing rapidly both in the number and the scale.  Therefore, the use of underground space is an inevitable trend.   Due to natural conditions and limited access of underground space, maintenance, security and management of underground space are quite different from those of open space on the ground.  With Taiwan's rapid development in recent years, various types of underground space are sprawling. Security, maintenance and management of underground space are of concern to us all. The course for this semester begins with exploring  the uniqueness of underground space, then studying several disaster cases focusing on the fire rescue for road tunnels and ends with integrating different areas of knowledge such as civil engineering, mechanical engineering, management and tunnel safety.

description.zh: 進階職場專業英文針對本校碩博士生設計系列最後一哩之實務專業課程。課程內容以英語全球溝通為主軸，強化商業寫作、簡報、會議及談判等技巧及能力。
description.en: The course provides essential and pragmatic English language used in real workplace. As it is designed for postgraduate students, the course also takes into account students’ academic studies as well as centers on students’ future career prospects. Students are expected to practice and refine their English communication skills, in particular correspondence writing and speaking. In that vein, students will be required to compose business correspondence, such as letters, emails and memos, and also to perform in simulated meetings and to brief progress report in English.

notes: 限30人,本課程不計入工商博班畢業學分

name.zh: 合金狀態的基礎與材料設計
name.en: The foundation of alloy and materials design

description.zh: 相圖是材料的索引，對於長期設計及材料的瞭解非常重要。本課程是根據熱力學及固態理論，循序漸進來瞭解二元相圖。 並舉例來顯示相圖是如何應用在冶金學和材料料學上。
description.en: Phase diagrams are the maps of materials, which have been being important in designing and understanding materials for a long time. The lecture is organized to understand binary phase diagrams on the basis of thermodynamics and solidification theory.  Moreover, a number of examples will be given to show how phase diagrams are useful in metallurgy and materials science.

notes: 上課時間：101年11月3日至8日每日上午9-12時
